Author: HNG-Hid
Subject: Firefox
Body: Please add Arabic language asap.

Author: Farbod-cx
Subject: Suggestion!
Body:
Love firefox on pc.. but lack of few features makes it a bit difficult to use it on my iPhone..

* please add a gesture function.. especially for "next tab" and previous tab"
* or improve UI design a bit more (for every new tab, I have to move my thumb up and its not a very convenient way to change my tabs). I have an iPhone 6s+ btw.
*A "tab browser" feature on the lower or middle area of the screen would have been nice (like a small button on the lower left or the lower right side of the screen).
*I know iOS has a "go to the top function" but again its on top and hard to use, especially when firefox  runs in full screen mode.

Cheers!

Author: Yashasvi_r
Subject: It's Firefox!!
Body: Works well! Sync is awesome, auto login from desktop fails on mobile sites though.

URL auto complete is broken.

Author: Baidom
Subject: Firefix
Body: This app is amazing!!!!! Totally 5 Starr's

Author: Clibsy93
Subject: Clibsy93
Body:
Bonne application mais impossible de protéger avec un mot de passe ou un code. Normalement on doit pouvoir protéger l'accès à l'application avec un code mais celui-ci n'est pas pris en compte du coup n'importe qui peut ouvrir l'application à n'importe quel moment et le code ne sert finalement à rien 😤. 
🚨 Il serait judicieux de faire un correctif point de vue sécurit🚨
Translated Body: Good application but can not protect with a password or a code. Normally one should be able to protect the access to the application with a code but this one is not taken into account of the blow anyone can open the application at any moment and the code does not serve finally to Nothing. 🚨 It would be wise to make a corrective safety point of view

Author: Heflin94
Subject: Open in
Body:
Sooo been an apple guy my whole life, but was having trouble with a server using safari so thought I'd try Firefox.
Using fire fox on a desktop I do that everyday but on my phone it felt alien, like I was using Internet explorer 😷🤒.
but then I tried to download a file but I needed to open it in a specific app which was impossible to do with your app so it was completely useless to me. I do not think my scenario would apply to most people but yeah I can't use it.

Author: Tonygtg
Subject: Great - thank you Firefox
Body: Great - thank you Firefox

Author: GreatSport
Subject: Love it!! PLEASE add content blocking!!!
Body:
Pleas FF team:

1. Add content blocking. I keep having to use Safari since FF cannot block content and some sites are almost unusable on mobile due to the number of ads. Plus, I don't like being followed around the web :(

2. Mobile/Desktop bookmark sync. Please, please, please make bookmarks I create on FF mobile sync to my desktop installs and vice versa. I keep having to use Google Chrome for this.

If you could add those 2 features, I could switch 100% to FF as my mobile web browser!!

Wish list feature: Mobile extensions. Not sure if this is even possible, but even a small number of high-quality add-ons would be awesome!

❤️ you FF 😊

Author: roberuberu
Subject: Impossible de déplacer les onglets
Body: Impensable sur un navigateur aujourd'hui... Comment voulez faire une recherche si vous ne pouvez pas réorganiser vos onglets pour en mettre de côté ??
Translated Body: Unthinkable on a browser today ... How do you do a search if you can not rearrange your tabs to set aside ??

Author: 大风起兮裙飞扬a
Subject: 中外有别
Body: 我在电脑端的火狐是英文版的，界面很清爽。之前装过中国版的，不是一个档次。今天，怀着对火狐的好感下载了ios版，略失望。搜索引擎默认百度，还有淘宝京东渣浪等一批网站 卧槽。赶紧卸载。是时候申请一个美版 Apple ID了
Translated Body: I am in the computer side of the Firefox is the English version of the interface is very refreshing. Before installed the Chinese version, not a grade. Today, with the good impression of Firefox downloaded ios version, slightly disappointed. Search engine default Baidu, as well as Taobao Jingdong Ma Lang and a number of sites lying groove. Quickly uninstall. It's time to apply for a US version of Apple ID

Subject: Gg

Author: Rio Onasis
Subject: Firefox
Body: Internet healty

Author: timberlake_27
Subject: Peggiora
Body: La uso ogni giorno ma sto vedendo che peggiora sempre di più. Rendetela più veloce e sopratutto più performante specie nella splitview o nella navigazione delle schede
Translated Body: I use it every day but I'm seeing it getting worse more and more. Make it faster and above all more powerful especially in splitview or tab navigation

Author: PukDieFliege
Subject: So viele Fehldarstellungen..
Body: Nachdem Mozilla ja genötigt ist ebenfalls WebKit zu verwenden ist es mir echt ein Rätsel, wie sie es hinbekommen so viele Fehldarstellungen und kaputte Skripte zu fabrizieren. Im Safari laufen die Webseiten an denen der Firefox scheitert immer problemlos...
Translated Body: After Mozilla is also forced to use WebKit it is really a mystery to me how they manage to fabricate so many misrepresentations and broken scripts. In the Safari, the web pages where the Firefox always failed ...

Author: larfenix
Subject: Las imagenes
Body: Nada que el navegador será muy bueno y todo lo que queráis pero cuando quiero guardar una foto en el carrete tengo que irme a Safari por que desde Firefox no se puede por mucho que apriete la pantalla.
Translated Body: Nothing that the browser will be very good and everything you want but when I want to save a photo on the reel I have to go to Safari because from Firefox you can not by far squeeze the screen.

Author: Lglpt
Subject: Beste browser
Body: Werkt op alle platformen, gegevens te synchroniseren, aandacht voor privacy en gebruiksgemak.
Translated Body: Works on all platforms, sync data, privacy attention and ease of use.

Author: たけYABU
Subject: ん？
Body:
勝手に初期化された。
最近のMozillaを象徴してるかのようだ。
Translated Body: It was initialized arbitrarily. It seems that it symbolizes the recent Mozilla.

Author: 顺利升级
Subject: 好用，但还是有个设置问题
Body: 好长时间没用了，比以前的版本好用多啦，非常喜欢，但是还有一个非常重大的bug。默认的设置，无法调用中文输入法，需要打开设置打开允许第三方键盘。真的不明白为什么不默认打开。
Translated Subject: Easy to use, but still have a setting problem
Translated Body: For a long time useless, than the previous version easy to use more, very much like, but there is a very important bug. The default setting can not be called by the Chinese input method, which requires the opening of the opening to allow the third party keyboard. Really do not understand why not open by default.

Author: Mycop5
Subject: Нетподдержки ios 7,8
Body:
Сделайте в ваших продуктах мин поддержу iOS 7
Не все хотят обновляться до последних версий
Translated Body: Do in your mines products support iOS 7 Not everyone wants to update to the latest versions

Author: kommadreizehn
Subject: Fast but buggy when unstable.
Body: It's the fastest browser I tried so far, but when I came across a site it didn't like, it broke down in a loop. Over and over and over until I reinstalled the app. Maybe put in a failsafe so that it doesn't try to reload a site it already broke down over more than once.

Author: ALEX228
Subject: OpenSource
Body: It's a best browser for iOS. 10/10.

Author: 蛇巳。
Subject: 操作性にやや難あり
Body:
タブボタン等が一箇所に集約されている為、操作にやや疲れるのが難点ですが、読み込み速度は非常に速くまた非常に軽いですね。
この操作を何とかして欲しいです。
Translated Body: Since the tab buttons etc. are concentrated in one place, it is difficult to get a bit tired of the operation, but the reading speed is very fast and it is very light. I want you to do this operation somewhat.

Author: jairomolina
Subject: Funciona
Body: Uma boa opção.
Translated Body: A good option.

Author: Rikson@Rapper
Subject: スタートページが設定できる
Body:
主要なブラウザでスタートページが設定できるのはFirefoxしか見つからない。

ここ最近のスタートページを強制的に押し付けてくる風潮が好きじゃない。
とは言え、不満がないわけでは無い。

せっかくブックマーク同期してるのにモバイルとPCでフォルダが別れているのは謎。

デザインはMozillaっぽく、嫌いではない。
Translated Body: Only the Firefox can find the start page can be set with the main browser. I do not like the trend of forcing the latest start page here. However, it is not without complaint. It is a mystery that folders are separated by mobile and PC although we are synchronizing bookmarks with much effort. The design looks like Mozilla, I do not dislike it.

Author: anzicain
Subject: Un plantage professionnel
Body: Très déçu car n'arrête pas de planter pendant la rédaction des messages, etc. Sur Facebook, une vraie plaie. Ils ont tué l'esprit Firefox ont lui dotant d'un plantage professionnel. À une revoir d'urgence!!!
Translated Body: Very disappointed because do not stop to plant during the writing of the messages, etc. On Facebook, a real plague. They killed the Firefox mind have endowing him with a professional crash. At an emergency review !!!

Author: Casey stencil
Subject: Better on iPad
Body:
I'd give the iPhone version 2.5 stars. I'd prefer actual tabs, but this is still better than Firefox Focus.on the iPad pro, it's probably 4 or 4.5 stars. That implementation is excellent and I wish they'd do the same on the 6+ (at least do it in landscape mode).

I'll probably stick to dolphin on my phone and this on my iPad.

Author: Jozele^
Subject: Moved el icono de pestañas a la parte de abajo por favor!!
Body: Soy fan de firefox, pero la pestaña arriba me resulta muy incómoda.
Translated Subject: Moved the tab icon to the bottom please !!
Translated Body: I'm a firefox fan, but the tab above is very uncomfortable for me.

Author: ccwiroll
Body: Mozilla is an amazing nonprofit doing wonderful work - and this is the only open & honest browser that is quick, doesn't spy on you, and helps fight for net neutrality every time you crack it open. <3

Author: UPstrap
Subject: Lame on iPad
Body: I have a new iPad Pro.  Sadly Firefox does not function well as the keyboard covers the area I'm typing in once I get way a few paragraphs down. They will sort it out I am sure but as of July 20th it's not happening.

Author: 叼着烟，看那故事！
Subject: 好用
Body: 超级好用的浏览器
Translated Body: Super easy to use browser

Author: Thom von dr Hamm
Subject: Lief schon besser
Body:
Eingeschränkter Nutzungsbereich der OS Version - Add-ons werden nicht unterstützt.
Habe ich schon besser in Erinnerung.
Translated Body: Restricted use of the OS version - Add-ons are not supported. I already remember better.

Author: Rhzyak
Subject: Mostly keep it for syncing
Body:
Doesn't really have anything special about it considering it HAS to use Apple's Webkit;  but not even a good UI... 
## The hamburger menu animation is pretty unnecessary, and that same menu holds just ONE item for a second page, that's pretty bad 
## The StartPage history tab should have a "clear recent history" button (similar to what I last remember from Android), pretty cumbersome to have history cleaning hidden under many menus 
## bookmarks saved here do not appear on Firefox desktop, but do appear when syncing to a new mobile device
## in general, doesn't even have much customization *ahemHamburgerMenuahem*

Author: Fbsucks74747
Subject: Mozilla is the best!
Body: Can't go wrong with Firefox!

Author: phuong ninh
Subject: Tốt
Body: Một ứng dụng tốt

Body:
please make better
downloader,mini music&video player screen,improment ui,....features can be awesome for firefox

thx for support

Author: Jack and Sam
Subject: 最高！でも…
Body:
Firefoxがiphoneでも使えて便利です！！
今回のアップデートのqrコード読み取り機能は愛用できます^_^
しかし…アドオンが使えないのは特に残念です…
せめて需要の高いアドオンを追加できるように、特にublock origin等は追加できるようにしてほしいです。
また、アドオンも使えないにしては容量が大きいです…
Androidの時も愛用していましたが、550mbを超えたことはなかったので正直驚いています、軽容量化と、ublock origin導入、検討お願いします。
Translated Body: Firefox can be used even on iphone and is useful! It is! I can favorably use the qr code reading function of this update ^ _ ^ But it is particularly disappointing that addons can not be used ... At the very least I would like you to be able to add ublock origin etc., especially so that you can add add - ons with high demand . Also, if you can not use add-ons as well, the capacity is large ... I used to patronize on Android, but I was honestly surprised because it never exceeded 550 mb, introduction of light capacity, introduction of ublock origin, consideration To do.

Author: Augustus 6498
Subject: Too many bugs
Body: Every time I try to get into the app, it kicks me out and restarts my tablet. What a cancerous app Firefox is

Author: Greenbacks and stacks
Subject: I wanted to like firefox
Body: The app has frequent freezing problem i have multiple times a day.

Author: GreatSport
Subject: Love it!! A few requests...
Body:
Please FF team:

1. Make night mode change to a dark UI. I can dim the screen brightness myself.

2. Add content blocking. I keep having to use Safari since FF cannot block content and some sites are almost unusable on mobile due to the number of ads. Plus, I don't like being followed around the web :(

3. Add mobile/desktop bookmark sync. Please, please, please make bookmarks I create on FF mobile sync to my desktop installs and vice versa. I keep having to use Google Chrome for this.

If you could add those features 2-3, I could switch 100% to FF as my mobile web browser!!

Wish list feature: Mobile extensions. Not sure if this is even possible, but even a small number of high-quality add-ons would be awesome!

❤️ you FF 😊

Subject: Huh?
Body: The new night mode is ridiculous. It's like looking through a dark film that covers the entire screen. Makes it harder to read anything. FAIL. Otherwise, this browser is nice.

Subject: Crashes after update

❤️👍🏻

Author: Cobo04
Subject: Good but could be better
Body:
Having used FF as my default browser on all my other kit was eager to get it on my iPhone. Yes it's good but...

What is the equivalent of about:config?

How do I show the menu (File, etc)?

Update doesn't work. Click on it and it sort of opens then crashes. So have deleted it and back to Safari until its fixed

Author: nepholits
Subject: Still broken
Body: Latest update takes ages to load, and there's no option to hide the new and unwanted "Visit Again" section. Guess it's back to Chrome then...

Author: Ad5001
Subject: LE new navigateur iOS
Body:
Utilisateur de Firefox pour ordinateur, j'ai décider d'essayer cette version mobile iOS (j'avais été un peu déçu par les performances) et j'ai été agréablement surpris par la vitesse du navigateur ainsi que sa fluidité de navigation.

Etant donné la législation Apple sur les Addons, je m'en passe tant bien que mal.

Malgré ce bémol, Firefox est désormais mon navigateur favoris pour iOS, loin devant Safari et Chrome.

Un effort louable de Mozilla pour cette application méritant le 5 étoiles !
Translated Body: As a Firefox computer user, I decided to try this iOS mobile version (I had been a bit disappointed by the performance) and I was pleasantly surprised by the speed of the browser and its fluidity of navigation. Given the Apple legislation on the Addons, I do not do it well. Despite this flat, Firefox is now my favorite browser for iOS, far ahead of Safari and Chrome. A commendable effort from Mozilla for this application worthy of the 5 stars!

Author: Harryhhtzcv
Subject: Funktioniert nach dem gestrigen Update nicht mehr

Translated Subject: Does not work after yesterday's update

Author: G-man1971
Subject: Version 8 of Firefox made better. 🙂
Body: New release of Firefox version 8 makes this a better browser overall, great new features like QR code reader, night mode and new tab experience is what Firefox needed for a long time. Firefox is now right up there with the leading browsers in terms of competition and should be worth checking out. Best browser app available. 5 stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Author: nepholits
Subject: Still broken
Body: Latest update takes ages to load, over 15 seconds to load and display top sites. No option to hide the new and unwanted "Visit Again" section. Guess it's back to Chrome then...

Author: Surfeurrapide
Subject: Enfin un navigateur libre et pas intrusif
Body:
La dernière version est excellente et sur mon iPhone je n'utilise plus que Firefox

J'attendais depuis longtemps ce navigateur qui respecte ma vie privée et est efficace. C'est fait. Il bloque bien les pub et les cookies sur mon iPhone. Très fluide et bien conçu.
La synchronisation entre mes deux PC Windows 10 et mon iPhone 6S par Firefox est parfaite

À quand une version Tor?
Translated Subject: Finally a free browser and not intrusive
Translated Body: The last version is excellent and on my iPhone I use only Firefox I have been waiting for this browser that respects my privacy and is effective. It is done. It blocks ads and cookies on my iPhone. Very fluid and well designed. The synchronization between my two PCs Windows 10 and my iPhone 6S by Firefox is perfect When a Tor version?

Author: Leo Coombes
Subject: Manca tutto, soprattutto la sicurezza
Body: le password salvate si possono visualizzare senza master password...
Translated Body: Saved passwords can be displayed without a master password ...

Author: MJH-!
Subject: Crashes after update
Body: Latest update 8.0 crashing when logging in to account to sync on both iPhone 7+ and iPod touch. Unusable. Please fix!

Author: CuriousMarc
Subject: Let down by user interface
Body: It's far, very far from being the superb browser as the desktop version. Being able to sync with your other Firefox browsers is the best feature. But using it is dreadful. The user interface is particularly bad. No menus are directly accessible. Takes four clicks to get to a bookmark. The same star icon might mean add to your favorites, or go to your bookmark menu, you don't know. It's far beyond Safari and most lesser browsers for usability. Which is a real shame, as it should not be hard to fix.

Author: asti 1814
Subject: Update heute 20.07.17
Body:
habe seit dem Update nicht mehr die Möglichkeit Bilder direkt zu kopieren oder zu speichern muss jetzt vorher herunterladen WARUM? 
wäre nett wenn Ihr das wieder ändern würdet!!! spart Zeit und Nerven...mal abgesehen von unnützen Datenverbrauch!!!
Translated Body: Since the update no longer have the possibility to directly copy or save images must now download WHY? Would be nice if your would change again! Saves time and nerves ... apart from useless data consumption!

Translated Body: Since the last update, firefox no longer starts, just after the start, firefox crashes completely. Please patch. Was always satisfied with the old function.

Author: cjhfh
Subject: 동기화는 잘 되네요.
Body:
근데 즐겨찾기 이용이 좀 불편하게 돼있어요 
데스크탑-모바일 북마크를 굳이 분류해야되나 싶기도 하구 터치를 하나하나 해서 들어가야 되고, 다른 사이트 중에 즐겨찾기 이용하는 게 조금 번거롭네요. 
그외에는 쾌적한 것 같네요.

Author: S.Yuasa

Body:
画像が保存できなくなったので修正よろしく。
治らなかったらアンスト。
Translated Body: The image can not be saved, so please fix it. If it does not heal, Unst.

Author: Jobsagoodun
Subject: Not much privacy with this.
Body:
No way to block adverts, or their tracking websites. No way to block cookies. No whitelist, or preferably, blacklist. No way to switch off JavaScript. I even had to opt-out of sending info to Mozilla. It should be opt-in !!

Not a lot of good, if I'm completely honest. Safari is bug-ridden trash, but it's still better than this.

I'm happy that Mozilla tried. But sadly, they didn't try very hard, as far as privacy and security goes.

Author: Inavas.mian
Subject: This version keeps crashing. Can no longer use my fav browser
Body: This version keeps crashing. Can no longer use my fav browser

Author: Tbro1
Subject: Crashing from new update
Body: Can't launch app, crashes constantly on 7+.

Author: mkjzna
Subject: Still?????
Body:
Version 8 and there is still no quick way to pick a bookmark!!!  Syncing with a desktop causes the following just to open a new bookmark in the same tab:

1) press on address bar
2) Press on star
3) That ALWAYS shows the folder labeled "Desktop Bookmarks" so click on that AGAIN.
4) THEN, click on "Bookmarks Toolbar".  Thankfully I put all my bookmarks in folders off my toolbar.
5) Click on whatever folder I want for the bookmark I need "News, Sports, etc..."
6) Click on the actual bookmark!

WOW, 6 steps just to change the web page!

Safari:

1) Click on bookmark icon then2 or 3
2) Maybe navigate to different folder
3) click bookmark

Bitte schnellstmöglich beheben, da es bis jetzt zum Firefox eigentlich keine vernünftige Alternative gab…
Translated Body: I have the same problem as Freehusky, since the update is a reasonable working with the Firefox because of the frequent crashes simply no longer possible ... Please fix as fast as possible, since until now, there was actually no real alternative to Firefox ...

Subject: Toujours pas de synchronisation complète
Body: Il est regrettable que les signets mis sur le iPhone ne puissent être synchroniser vers l'ordinateur. C'est un manque qui rend l'application inintéressante en comparaison avec Safari ou Chrome.
Translated Body: It is unfortunate that the bookmarks put on the iPhone can not be synchronized to the computer. This is a lack that makes the application uninteresting in comparison with Safari or Chrome.

Subject: Ugh "recommendations"
Body: I love Mozilla, hate the nags and recommendations

Author: Megawuff
Subject: Abstürze (immer noch)
Body:
schon bei dem letzten Update hatte ich das Phänomen, dass nach Eingabe einer URL und Enter sich Firefox verabschiedete. dies hat sich leider auch durch dieses Update nicht geändert, ich gebe zum Beispiel Amazon.de ein, drücke Enter und darf dann Firefox über die Home-Taste wieder in den Vordergrund holen beziehungsweise in den meisten Fällen sogar neu starten…

Da Firefox aber mein favorisierter Browser ist, warte ich halt auf das nächste Update…
Translated Body: Already with the last update I had the phenomenon that after entering a URL and enter, Firefox took off. This has unfortunately not changed by this update, I enter, for example Amazon.de, press enter and may then fire Firefox over the home button again in the foreground fetch or in most cases even restart ... Since Firefox but my favorite Browser is, I'm waiting for the next update ...

Author: Moses1987

Body:
Es ist das erste Mal, dass bei einem Versionssprung nicht sämtliche offenen Tabs verschwinden.
Ansonsten bleibt der Browser so, wie er sein soll. Stabil und sicher.
Translated Body: This is the first time that any of the open tabs will disappear. Otherwise, the browser remains as it should be. Stable and safe.

With the last update an app crashes immediately after start.

IOS 10.3.2

Subject: Getting constant crashes after update
Body: Opening settings, typing in the search bar, closing tabs, going to any link, and trying to synch all crashes the app after recent update.  Only way to visit a site is opening a recently visited site when initially opening the app... then it will crash if you try to navigate away.

please make better

Translated Subject: So far top ... latest version crashes ... iOS10

apparently the last update of Jul 20 / 21 sends the browser crashing and thus rendering it entirely useless.

There used to be quality assurance..

wäre nett wenn Ihr das wieder ändern würdet!!! spart Zeit und Nerven...mal abgesehen von unnützen Datenverbrauch!!!

Author: Jack and Sam
Subject: 最高！でも…
Body:
Firefoxがiphoneでも使えて便利です！！
今回のアップデートのqrコード読み取り機能は愛用できます^_^
しかし…アドオンが使えないのは特に残念です…
せめて需要の高いアドオンを追加できるように、特にublock origin等は追加できるようにしてほしいです。
また、アドオンも使えないにしては容量が大きいです…
Androidの時も愛用していましたが、550mbを超えたことはなかったので正直驚いています、軽容量化と、ublock origin導入、検討お願いします。
Translated Body: Firefox can be used even on iphone and is useful! It is! I can favorably use the qr code reading function of this update ^ _ ^ But it is particularly disappointing that addons can not be used ... At the very least I would like you to be able to add ublock origin etc., especially so that you can add add - ons with high demand . Also, if you can not use add-ons as well, the capacity is large ... I used to patronize on Android, but I was honestly surprised because it never exceeded 550 mb, introduction of light capacity, introduction of ublock origin, consideration To do.

Author: SamDFWTX
Subject: WTH Moz?!
Body:
The top sites option used to be functional and useful, this "upgrade" is neither.  If I wanted my history displayed, I'd go there.  Worse yet, there's no way to turn this sh*t off.  But the icing on the cake is that *now* you can only delete things one-at-a-time, with context menus. 

How can I get the previous version, cuz this makes me want to throw my iPad against a wall?

Subject: Please fix
Body: This was my browser of choice on any device. Used to work and sync flawlessly before the last update for iOS. Now it's completely useless. Unless Mozilla tries to kick out all of its users they need to fix ASAP.

Author: LiefLayer
Subject: Il migliore tra i browser ma manca...
Body:
Nonostante su ios Firefox senza plugin sia limitato e usi un altro motore di rendering rimane il migliore sotto molti punti di vista.
Quel che però davvero manca è un downloader integrato... È impossibile scaricare gli allegati delle mail ad esempio... E questa funzionalità dovrebbe essere possibile visto che altri l'hanno fatto.
Translated Body: Although on iOS Firefox without plugin is limited and use another rendering engine remains the best in many ways. But what's really missing is an integrated downloader ... It's impossible to download mail attachments for example ... And this feature should be possible as others have done it.

Subject: Version Number 8.0.1 is creating issues it shutdown automatically after opening.
Body: Version Number 8.0.1 is creating issues it shutdown automatically after opening.

Subject: 何度起動しても落ちる

落ちまくりですよおお
早く何とかしてえええええ！
iPhoneSE [iOS10.3.3]

追記
iOS10.3.2のiPhone5sでは通常通り使用出来るので、iOS最新バージョンだとすぐ落ちるようです。

Author: I-phone-007
Subject: Mozilla verspielt seinen Ruf
Body:
Version 8.0.1 hat immer noch kein Werbeblocker, welches unnötig den Datentransfer hochschraubt.

Ältere Versionen:
Zugegeben, es hat sich was verbessert. Mozilla hat es fast geschaft zu anderen Browsern aufzuholen, mehr aber auch nicht ! State of the Art zu sein (zu wollen)  verlangt mehr.
Was aber nach wie vor DER Kritikpunkt ist, es fehlt ein WERBEBLOCKER !!
oder der Menüpunkt ist derart gut versteckt das auch andere ihn nicht finden.

App gelöscht !
Translated Body: Version 8.0.1 still has no advertising block, which unnecessarily increases the data transfer. Older versions: Admittedly, something has improved. Mozilla has almost made it to other browsers to catch up, but not more! To be a state of the art requires more. But what is still the criticism, it is missing a WERBBLOCKER !! Or the menu point is so well hidden that others will not find it. App deleted!

Author: にとろん2106
Subject: 何度起動しても落ちる
Body:
落ちまくりですよおお
早く何とかしてえええええ！
iPhoneSE [iOS10.3.3]

Author: Bowbak
Subject: Plante depuis la MaJ

Translated Body: Same as other reviews: since the last update, it crashes at launch - impossible to use. I hope a fix will happen, if not bye bye Firefox

Author: me2and4u
Subject: Nicht alles funktioniert:
Body:
z.B. "TouchID & Code" greifen trotz Aktivierung gar nicht. Trotz des aktivierten (alternativen) In-App-Codes kann die App ohne Eingabe dieses Sperrcodes wieder geöffnet werden, ganz egal ob Tabs offen sind oder nicht, auch egal ob die App komplett geschlossen war (aus dem Multitasking "gekillt") oder aus dem Multitasking heraus geöffnet wird.
Bitte, bessert da umgehend nach!

- iPhone SE
- iOS 10.3.3
Translated Body: Eg "TouchID & Code" do not attack despite activation. Despite the activated (alternative) in-app code, the app can be re-opened without entering this lock code, regardless of whether tabs are open or not, regardless of whether the app was completely closed (from the multitasking "gekillt") or from the Multitasking is opened. Please, correct it immediately! - iPhone SE - iOS 10.3.3

Subject: Unusable...keeps crashing

Subject: Update Disaster
Body: The last two (July 20/21) have totally ruined the app. Crashes every time, before I have a chance to try anything!! OS10 on a iPhone SE.

Author: River_Dweller
Subject: Crashes on 10.3.2
Body: Useless now. Will not work. Crashes immediately. I guess I go back to Chrome. Junk app. Don't install. Wait for a new report version that hopefully is less buggy.

Author: Waldi66
Subject: Absturz nach Update
Body: Leider nach dem neuen Update von IOS kommt es nach kurzer Zeit zum Absturz 😣. Update: jetzt geht alles wieder 👍
Translated Body: Unfortunately after the new update of IOS it comes after a short time to crash 😣. Update: now everything goes again 👍

Author: MikeMüller
Subject: Stürzt nach ein paar Sekunden ab
Body: Aktuelle Version ist nicht zu gebrauchen.
Translated Body: Current version is not to be used.

Author: Emdeezee
Subject: App won't launch.
Body: As some others have said, the app won't open. You click on it, the white background appears, then it closes.

Author: Chief Smoking Sock
Subject: Nur noch Abstürze!
Body:
Nach dem vorletzten Update waren erst einmal alle Tabs verschwunden. Schock!!!
Seit dem letzten Update stürzt die App sofort ab, noch während sie die neuen Tabs wiederherstellen will. 
Auch das neueste aktuelle Update hat daran leider nichts  ändern können. Absturz nach 3-6 Sekunden, während die App versucht die Tabs der letzten funktionierenden Sitzung wiederherzustellen!
Ich werde die App schweren Herzens löschen, in Gedenken an Zeiten als sie stabiler lief als Safari. Noch einmal werde ich mir meine Tabs nicht zusammenstellen. Ein Import der Tabs kommt für mich nicht in Frage, da ich unterwegs über iPhone andere Seiten aufrufe als mit dem Rechner zu Hause oder gar auf Arbeit.
Translated Body: After the penultimate update all tabs had disappeared. Shock!!! Since the last update, the app instantly crashes while it is restoring the new tabs. Even the latest update has unfortunately nothing to change. Crash after 3-6 seconds while the app tries to restore the tabs of the last working session! I will delete the app heavy heart, in memory of times when it ran more stable than Safari. Again, I will not put my tabs together. An import of the tabs is not in question for me, because I on the way via iPhone other sides as calls with with the calculator at home or even at work.

Author: Xp13

Subject: Keep crashing 5 sec after launch

Author: Briggleman
Subject: Allows pop ups that lock up the iPad
Body: Safari and Chrome are much better at protecting your iPad from nefarious websites that allow hard to get rid of pop up ads.  These ads in some cases force you to close Firefox, while Chrome and Safari allow you to shut the ad down. The latest update has made it worse.

Translated Body: Even if it starts up it fell immediately.

Author: @QAppReview
Subject: Keep crashing 5 sec after launch
Body: The crash was caused by syncing with login.  Delete and reinstall without login will fix the crash.  Pls this bug asap.

Author: vs99102

Latest updates are great. Love the tab management, incognito mode, speed, open source license, and respect for user privacy. 

Love it.

Author: KUNDS
Subject: Not best
Body:
I prefer this browser 
Downloader Pro - Multitab Browser

Author: Arandin
Subject: Embarrassing
Body:
Please DO SOMETHING about the freezes!

It lags for up to 10 seconds!!! every time I type a character in the url bar, presumably because it's searching for matches in my web history. Since I've been using the desktop version for ages, I gathered a lot of browsing data, however the app, now past its eighth major release, still cannot cope with some string matching without freezing for so annoyingly long that it straight up murders the whole user experience.

Body:
Latest update 8.0 crashing when logging in to account to sync on both iPhone 7+ and iPod touch. Unusable.

Update: v.8.0.1 crashes almost immediately upon opening (iOS V.10.3.3). This app is quickly becoming pretty useless for me.

Seit dem Update geht der Firefox nur noch beschränkt. Ich hatte ständig Abstürze, habe alle Apps und tabs geschlossen. Keine Besserung - dann geht er wieder ein paar Stunden. Und ohne Vorwarnung z.b beim 2048 spielen - Crash!
Liebes Firefox Team, bitte dringend patchen. Ich kann die App so nicht nutzen.
Ansonsten ist diese App seit Jahren auf meinem homescreen und dort nicht wegzudenken
Translated Subject: Since this update crashes. This constantly decreases
Translated Body: Since the update, the Firefox is only limited. I always had crashes, closed all apps and tabs. No improvement - then he goes back a couple of hours. And without warning such as playing at 2048 - Crash! Dear Firefox team, please urgently patchen. I can not use the app like this. Otherwise, this app has been on my homescreen for years and not to be imagined

Subject: Latest update keeps crashing
Body:
I invested so much use in FF on iOS, latest update has ruined it. View later is such a useful feature, but lack of bookmark all tabs feature means that now with sync causing crashes, I have lost them all.
To top it off, I cannot sign up to the Mozilla support pages on iphone because I receive the message cookies aren't enabled; yet they are enabled in my setting for safari (I can't sign up in FF as it keeps crashing!!!)
Please sort this out!!!!
FF 8.0.1
iOS 10.3.3

Author: Relen4less
Subject: Crashing for me since second to last update.
Body: Crashes and closes within a few seconds. I discovered that it is due to the "Sync" feature. If you remove the app and reinstall it, the sync will be off and it will work. Turn sync back on and it will start crashing again. Surprised it hasn't been fixed in the last two updates.

firefox could be the best browser, but you guys keep changing stuff

Author: Kundun108
Subject: Fantastic!
Body: Firefox is my go-to browser on the iPhone. (And my computer, too!). I have no more trouble with Firefox than with any other mobile browser. The QR reader on the new update is most welcome. I used it within a few minutes after the update completed, it worked great! I ditched the stand-alone reader I had previously installed. I love the updates and improvements from the Firefox team, they are always working to make the product easier.

Body:
他のレビューにもある通り、アップデート後は落ちまくりでしたが、、一旦削除後に再インストールしたところ落ちなくなりました。
FireSyncを使用していたのでブックマークも復旧。
落ちなければ星5つも良かったけど。
Translated Subject: I will get over with reinstallation
Translated Body: As was also the case with other reviews, it fell after updating, but once it was reinstalled after deleting it did not fall off. Because we were using FireSync, bookmarks are recovered. Five star was also good unless it fell.

Subject: Now pop-ups?
Body:
iPhone 6 Plus

I love Firefox, it's way better (and quicker) than Safari. But since the last update, I now get a pop-up blue banner asking if I want to go to "copied link"? This pops up EVERY time I use Firefox! Kinda annoying, can't I switch this feature off?

Translated Body: If the application crashes after a few seconds, uninstall it and then reinstall it. This solved the problem I had on my iPhone.

Author: ctf760
Subject: Works, needs more features
Body:
Works, but needs more features. Here are my suggested features:

-Addons like Android version
-Ad Blocker
-Ability to set rules for cookies and history like desktop version
-Better layout
-Guest Sessions like Android Version
-Save as PDF like Android Version
-Restore Tabs like Android Version

Add that, reduce the amount of crashes, and you have a 5 star browser.

I really like the QR code thing too, an innovative feature other browsers will slip into their browser eventually.

Author: Jl379
Subject: Changed for the worse
Body: I used to enjoy this browser until the update.  The new pinned site/history tab does not meet my needs, it makes it an inconvenient browser to use.  I don't need or want my first links that show up to be stuff I already read or looked at.  I don't know why Firefox and Chrome are so insistent that is what people want to see when they open their browser.  I want to see my bookmarks, or a customizable list.  Also, "pinned sites" can't tell the difference between google search and google news links, and it keeps overriding each rather than create a separate link.  I'm probably just going to delete Firefox and try something different.

Body: My go-to browser. Like it above others though seems to be loosing ground to Safari. Why 3D Touch was removed is beyond me. I used it all the time to open links in new tab.

Subject: 何度起動しても落ちる
Body:
落ちまくりですよおお

iPhoneSE [iOS10.3.3]

追記
iPadでもfirefoxを使っていて、同じように起動後7〜10秒ほどで落ちて使えない状態でした。
そこで他の方のレビューにある｢一旦削除してから再インストールすると直る｣をiPadで試して見たところ、確かに落ちなくなりました！

しかしiPhoneではタブを複数開いているので、削除&再インストールしたくない…

もう少し様子を見て、アップデートで改善される様子がなければiPhoneもこの手段でしょうかねえ。

※さらに追記※
落ちないと思ったのも束の間、再インストールしたiPadでも数分使っただけで落ちまくりになりました。

こんにゃろおおおおおおお！！！
Translated Subject: No matter how many times it starts up, it falls
Translated Body: I'm falling down Oh oh yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah! IPhoneSE [iOS 10.3.3] additions I used firefox even on iPad, it fell in about 7 to 10 seconds after startup and it was in a state that I could not use it. So I tried it on the iPad "I delete it once it is reinstalled after reinstalling" on other people's review, it certainly did not fall off! But since iPhone has multiple tabs open, I do not want to delete & reinstall ... If you look a little more and the situation is not improved by updating, iPhone may be this way too. * Further additions * I also thought that it would not fall, even in a brief period, even after using the reinstalled iPad for only a few minutes it fell off. Konnyaku Oh oh oh! ! !

Author: HerrSchwamm
Subject: Bester Browser für iOS
Body:
Firefox ist und bleibt der beste Browser! Schnell, elegant und unglaublich nützlich!

Leider ist es unter iOS nicht möglich einen ganz neuen Browser zu programmieren, daher musste hier auch Safari als Herzstück genommen werden.

Ist aber immer noch die beste Alternative zum Safari & hat viel mehr Funktionen. Lohnt sich auf jeden Fall!
Translated Body: Firefox is and remains the best browser! Fast, elegant and incredibly useful! Unfortunately, it is not possible to program a completely new browser under iOS, so Safari had to be taken as the centerpiece. But is still the best alternative to Safari & has much more features. It is definitely worth it!

Author: gnomechimpsky
Subject: A Browser to Trust
Body:
Mozilla has always been an organization (nonprofit, community-run) that puts functionality, usability, privacy, and security ahead of any other priorities. Suffice it to say, I will always prefer Firefox over its competitors who put advertising revenue above all else.

Working as head of a software company for the last 7 years, we have always required daily company web browsing to be in Firefox (testing in other browsers obviously happens to ensure compatibility in other browsers). But, we just don't trust any other popular browser for our business or daily development.

Author: Missxstatic
Subject: Not Working Properly
Body:
I just updated the app, it's really slow and not all pages open - they just wouldn't open at all or connect to a server. One page did open but none of the links would open, nor would it open in a new tab.

The app was working fine before the latest update, now it doesn't and everything is slow - trying to select from the menu does nothing, as the whole thing doesn't seem to work.

Author: 老堅
Subject: 无法同步pc版
Body: pc版火狐已有帐号，但登陆iOS版火狐却无法验证，要重新注册！好假！
Translated Body: Pc version of Firefox has an account, but landing iOS version of Firefox can not verify, to re-register! Good fake!

Author: andencoth
Subject: App continually crashes upon attempting to open!!
Body:
Sorry, but even this Aug. 3rd update does not work!! Still crashes when attempting to open! Latest ios on iPad 4.
Help!!
--------------------------------------------------------------

Please fix ASAP!

New update still does not work! App still crashes on attempting to open! This is on an IPAD 4. Please try again!!

Author: ممدوح بن فهد
Subject: ممتاز وجميل
Body: رائع ومميز
Translated Body: Gorgeous and distinctive

Author: drunkenjelzin
Subject: Firefox + Ipad Pro - das passt, bitte bitte noch mit Lesezeichenleiste
Body:
Die aktuelle Version des Firefox funktioniert unter iOS 10 und Benutzung des iPad Pro wunderbar. Auch bei mir keinerlei Abstürze, Hänger oder sonstige Lapalien - selbst die Synchronisierung der Favoriten klappt hervorragend.

Ich würde mir allerdings noch eine Leseleiste der Favoriten, oben unter dem Eingabefeld, wie in der Desktopversion, oder ähnlich der Leseleiste des Safaribrowsers wünschen, erleichtert es doch die Benutzung synchronisierter Favoriten ungemein.

Vielen Dank für die tolle Arbeit
Translated Subject: Firefox + Ipad Pro - that fits, please please with bookmarks
Translated Body: The current version of the Firefox works wonderfully under iOS 10 and use of the iPad Pro. Also with me no crashes, hangers or other Lapalia - even the synchronization of the favorites folds excellently. However, I would still like to see a favorite of the favorites, at the top of the input field, as in the desktop version, or similar to the Safaribrowser's reading bar, making it easier to use synchronized favorites. Thanks for the great work

Author: jackson0991
Subject: Great app!
Body: Way better than safari.

Author: DyreLogan
Subject: Useless
Body: Firefox is useless when you go to Facebook using this browser. Always says "No internet. Try Again" So I switched to Safari or Chrome and they work flawlessly. Deleting this now.

Author: Kplan23
Subject: Tabulating
Body: On my iPhone 6s, Touch ID doesn't work. The app doesn't ask for it even though it's set for immediate.

Author: Kopfloch
Subject: Fire Safari!
Body:
Also man hätte ja wenigstens den Versuch unternehmen können sich in Details vom schrecklichen IOS Hausbrowser zu unterscheiden. Eine Kopie dieses ebenso schmucklosen wie unkreativen Apple Mists  hätte wirklich niemand gebraucht. Entweder hätte man sich seinem Stil treu bleiben sollen, oder sich erst gar nicht, um des zweifelhaften Prestiges willens, auf dem Altar des goldenen Käfigs AppStore opfern sollen.
Direkt wieder gelöscht!
Translated Body: So you could at least try to distinguish in details from the terrible IOS housebrowser. A copy of this as well as unpretentious Apple Mists really would not have needed anyone. Either one should have remained faithful to his style, or not be willing to sacrifice himself on the altar of the golden cage AppStore, if only for the doubtful prestige. Directly deleted again!

Author: Antoine 06879
Subject: C'est décevant :/
Body:
Quand on voit le logiciel sur pc on ne retrouve quasiment aucunes de ses fonctions.
Pas de personnalisation.
Pas d'extension
Peu de réglages

L'interface est plutôt bien adaptée au format mobile mais l'accès au raccourci de la barre personnel est juste trop compliqué autant utiliser la barre de recherche.

Au final rien ne démarque plus cette appli que d'autres alternatives comme Qwant alors qu'il y avait bien moyen de faire quelque chose de plus poussée à partir du logiciel initial; dommage.
Translated Body: When one sees the software on pc one finds almost none of its functions. No customization. No extension Few settings The interface is rather well adapted to the mobile format but access to the shortcut of the personal bar is just too complicated to use the search bar. In the end nothing else distinguishes this app from other alternatives like Qwant whereas there was well way to do something more advanced from the initial software; pity.

Author: asti 1814
Subject: Update heute 05.08.17
Body: Problem nach heutigem Update existiert immer noch!! Tap and hold funktioniert nicht...habe jetzt schon 4x bemängelt und gebeten das wieder zu ändern...bei anderen Browsern geht das...DANKE für die sehr schnelle Reaktion
Translated Body: Problem after today's update still exists !! Tap and hold does not work ... have already 4x complained and asked to change again ... with other browsers is the ... THANKS for the very fast response

Author: h.bellakhdar
Subject: impossible de faire la mise à jours
Body:
tout le monde favorise firefox
je mentionne seulement ce probleme de difficulté à mettre à jour, vraiment penible
Translated Body: Everyone favors firefox I mention only this problem of difficulty to update, really painful

Author: ny lone ranger
Subject: Worked fine until the August 03 update
Body: The August 03 caused the app to open and then close within a second or two. App worked fine until the August 03 update.

Author: 锈豺
Subject: html5游戏支持不好
Body: html5游戏支持不好，经常无响应状态后自动退出。
Translated Subject: Html5 game support is not good
Translated Body: Html5 game support is not good, often no response after the state automatically exit.

Author: ScottOreily
Subject: Please add the tab switcher to the the bottom
Body: The only thing preventing me from using this app is that the tab switcher is at the top right instead of the bottom like it is in Safari. Also, please make the status bar white instead of black :(

Author: Mr Isidro
Subject: Won't finish updating!!
Body: This latest update ruined my Firefox! Keeps saying unable to download app and never stops the updating process. Making it inoperable. Please fix this!

Author: BeaglePapa61
Subject: Wieder top 👍🤠👌
Body: Bisher 5 Sterne! Seit dem neuesten Update kann ich Firefox nicht mehr öffnen, startet kurz und verschwindet dann in den Hintergrund. Hier läuft er weiter. Bringt mir nur nichts. Sobald ich ihn wieder in den Vordergrund hole, verschwindet er wieder 🙃😳🤔. Nach Neuinstallation alles wieder gut! Hatte man allerdings irgend wo auch schreiben können, dass man das tun soll!
Translated Body: So far 5 stars! Since the latest update, I can no longer open Firefox, launch briefly and then disappear into the background. Here he goes on. Just give me nothing. As soon as I bring him back into the foreground, he disappears again. After reinstalling everything again good! However, you could also write somewhere, that one should do that!

Author: catedt
Subject: 너무 좋아요
Body: 아주 만족하고 잘 쓰고 있어요 크롬같은 다른 브라우저나 앱들은 내 방문 사이트를 추적해서 활용하는 느낌이 드는데 이건 아닌거 같아요~ PC에서도 잘 쓰고 있어요~ 특히 사생활 보호 기능이 제일 좋아요~^^
Translated Body: I am very satisfied with it and I am writing well. Other browsers and apps like Chrome can use my site to track and utilize it, but I do not think this is good ~ I am writing well on PC ~ Especially privacy protection is the best ~ ^^

Author: edowillemse
Subject: Waardeloos synchen
Body:
als je een pagina in je mobiele browser wil synchroniseren en wil openen op je desktop, dan moet je ELKE KEER WEER inloggen in je mail om de verbinding in een email bericht te bevestigen!!! Pas dan kun je verder... Bizar onhandig en volkomen onacceptabel! 😡😠😖😣😔😟 wat een ruk browser

Tot ziens Firefox, hallo Opera
Translated Body: If you want to sync a page in your mobile browser and want to open it on your desktop, you MUST login EVERYONE in your email to confirm the connection in an email message !!! Only then can you continue ... Bizarre awkward and completely unacceptable! 😡😠😖😣😔😟 what a nice browser, bye Firefox, hello Opera

Author: kaaqua
Subject: Super
Body: Świetna przeglądarka. Gorąco polecam ;)
Translated Body: Great browser. I would highly recommend ;)

Author: Cobus20
Subject: Crash
Body: Your update now crashes on 6s.

Author: shiningXfinger
Subject: Freezing issues plague the app
Body: This issue started with the previous update- when trying to open Firefox, it will hang and freeze. It then locks up my phone until I have to shut it off. When it does load, it becomes unresponsive at times. Other times, I can type in a URL, but then it won't go to the site; it just sits there. I can type another URL, but still nothing will happen. I like the browser, but it's pretty much unusable.

Author: Negachin
Subject: Crash often, poor app
Body: This app running iOS 8.4.1, iPhone cars often and reset everything.

Author: Dane73
Subject: Please the Remove New Tab Popup!
Body:
Please remove that annoying blue notification that pops up every time I open a new tab.

I don't need the app to tell me I opened a new tab. I loved Firefox until that notification was added. Now it's just too annoying to use.

I guess I'm just going back to Dolphin. Firefox was my favorite browser until that new tab notification became a thing in version 7.0 I think.

Translated Body: The IP address is visible in anonymous mode, it is a shame.

Author: MunKee Morgan
Subject: Disappearing bookmarks
Body: Like bookmarks?  Firefox doesn't.  It erases them after a few days.

Author: wildeling
Subject: Thanks for everything
Body: I've been using Firefox for more than a decade now. Thanks for everything.

Author: Yapascha
Subject: Zoom
Body: Leider funktioniert die zoom Funktion nicht in mobile Ansicht . Bitte bearbeitet es . Auf Safari geht dies ohne Probleme auf jeder Website . Würde gerne Firefox weiter nutzen aber ohne zoom Funktion auf allen Seiten kann ich es nicht nutzen .
Translated Body: Unfortunately the zoom function does not work in mobile view. Please edit it. On Safari, this is easy on any website. Would gladly continue to use Firefox but without zoom function on all sides I can not use it.

Author: 🌺Stacey🌺
Subject: Crashing since update
Body: It worked fine until the last update. Now it crashes upon opening.

Author: astralnocturne
Subject: Just works
Body: I've used Firefox on my desktop for years and I'm glad I can get the same experience on mobile. Love that I can sync my bookmarks/history/open tabs between desktop and mobile. Overall, a fast mobile browser that just works!

Author: Wezea
Subject: Crash beim Start
Body: Absturz direkt beim Start.

Author: 🦌关注v💞公众號（乐玩团）
Subject: 好用
Body:
🍵无意中发现一份兼职，能利用空闲时间赚钱，～用着还挺好的，✨关.注V💕公众號（乐玩团）🌷里面有视频教程花两分钟看一下就都会了，～不要你任何费用就可以赚到零花銭，无论是学生👱🏻‍♀️、上班族🙎🏻‍♂️或是全职家庭主妇🤰🏻，都可以利用空闲的时间做，一天轻轻松松就能收入80元左右👍，而且操作简单方便，只要有手机都可以随时随地的兼职赚钱。真的棒极了，真心推荐你做！～最近才发现这个，真的很不错哦！～相信你会喜欢上的！建议大家有空都去体验半小时试试，🌇保证你一顿饭钱出来了。～下面就用不着看了，～下面真的没啥子意思了！！！谁都不傻越来越多的人懂得这个，真的是不错的福利。

Note V 💕 public number (music group) 🌷 inside a video tutorial to spend two minutes to see it will, Do not make any fees you can earn zero flowers, whether students 👱🏻 ♀ ️, office workers 🙎🏻 🙎🏻 ️ or full-time housewives 🤰🏻, can use the free time to do, one day can easily income 80 yuan or so, and easy to operate, as long as there are mobile phones can be anytime, anywhere to make money. Really great, really recommend you do! ~ Recently found this, really good oh! ~ I believe you will love it! It is recommended that you have time to experience half an hour to try to ensure that you meal out of a meal. ~ The following do not need to read, ~ the following really nothing mean! The The Who are not stupid more and more people know this, really is a good benefit. Playing for some time, feel pretty good, free time to play a play, you can enjoy the time ~ a lot of friends around to play, was recommended to download a play. Simple operation, play well, full of surprises! ~ Has always been good to feel better than the previous much better game is very fun, happy! This game can hang up leveling, when you are busy can also play, very good a game, recommend you play, the screen than the grade, a variety of copies of the task, so that civilians But also can play the wonderful, more real ~ my mind spring I stand upright in the image of the center of the spring when I use the breeze blowing to say a cry I am part of the spring is an upright spring I hear the sound of spring Is from my heart meande out by far away I use the sky of the birds on their own love to love the spring of life love the spring of life If the eyes are the soul of the hole is a pair of sash is the soul of the two Wang Qingquan that secret is Mind collection of a treasure is the soul of convergence hope that the review will be useful to you!

Author: buresan
Subject: 重い
Body: アップデートで異様に重くなった。アプリを開く時、履歴を開く時、ブックマークを開く時でそれぞれメニューを切り替えるだけで5秒くらいずつ固まる。
Translated Body: It got strangely heavy with the update. When opening an application, opening a history, opening a bookmark and setting the menu each time it hardens about 5 seconds.

Author: Vailene
Subject: Love it i
Body: I have zero issues with this on an iPhone 7. Syncs and navigates beautifully.

Author: Asasasaaaaaaaaaaa
Subject: 書籤超難用
Body:
進入桌面版書籤點選連結開啟網頁後，下次進入書籤時可以直接進入我上次開的資料夾內嗎？不然每次都要點好多層進去，因為這個原因，我在ios上都是用Safari和電腦版的firefox做同步

另外行動版書籤不能建資料夾做分類，超難用的
Translated Body: Into the desktop version of the bookmarks click to open the page, the next time you enter the bookmarks can be directly into my last open folder? Or every time there are many points into the layer, because for this reason, I was on the ios are using Safari and computer version of the firefox to do another mobile version of the bookmark can not be built to do the classification of materials, super difficult to use

Author: JBOMG
Subject: Bitte, Bitte holt Lesezeichen zurück !
Body:
Was bringt mir die Sync von Lesezeichen mit Desktop, wenn ich diese um vernunftig nutzen zu können erstmal durch unzählige rumgeklicke suchen muss !?

Da ist sogar noch Safari bequemer.. Firefox geht überhaupt an seine treue Benutzer zu und überlässt das Feld dem kaum konfigurierbaren Safari...

Was ist da bloss los? wer trifft solche schreckliche Entscheidungen ?  Gerade Firefox Benutzer wollen ihren Browser konfigurieren können..Jeder anderer x- Browser aus China ist mehr konfigurierbar als das hier...

Ich bin zutiefst enttäuscht...
Translated Body: What brings me the sync of bookmarks with desktop, if I use these reasonably to be able to first search through countless rumgeklicke !? Because even more Safari is more convenient .. Firefox goes to its loyal users at all and leaves the field to the barely configurable Safari ... What's going on there? Who makes such terrible decisions? Especially Firefox users want to configure their browser .. Any other x-browser from China is more configurable than the one here ... I am deeply disappointed ...

Author: ShintoPlasm
Subject: No point without tracker/ad blocking
Body: There is no real raison d'être for this browser on iOS, unless it gains a similar ad- and tracker-blocking functionality like Firefox Focus. Otherwise, not much point to this confusingly designed Safari wrapper.

Author: Shraga!bz
Subject: Crashes on launch. Can't use it anymore
Body:
Nope.... still crashes 😱
If you have many tabs open, don't install this update.
Still crashes... (update 8.1.1)

Author: APPFreund
Subject: QR Code Scanner
Body: ... ist eine tolle Idee, wenn er funktioniert. Bei dem QR Code an dem brother ID QR Code der Tonerkassette TN-2320 hat er nicht funktioniert. Zum Glück hatte ich noch den i-nigma Barcode Reader, damit hat es sofort funktioniert.
Translated Body: ... is a great idea when it works. The QR code on the brother ID QR code of the toner cartridge TN-2320 did not work. Fortunately, I still had the i-nigma Barcode Reader, so it worked immediately.

Author: Steckie 65
Subject: Stürzt nach Start fast immer sofort ab
Body:
Selten noch einwandfrei funktioniert Firefox. War immer zufrieden, aber das immer wieder neu starten nervt sehr. 
Leider, weil es ist normalerweise viel besser als mitgelieferte Standard Apple Browser.
Translated Body: Firefox is still working flawlessly. Was always satisfied, but always restarting is very annoying. Unfortunately, because it is usually much better than supplied standard Apple browser.

Author: 大咕噜狗
Subject: 自家focus支持问题
Body: 安装firefox focus以后，同样网页（*浪手机版）safari无广告，firefox有广告，简直大公无私。后续能考虑一下支持吗？
Translated Body: Install firefox focus after the same page (* wave mobile version) safari no advertising, firefox have ads, just unselfish. Can you consider support later?

Author: Nahid5571595
Subject: يوسف
Body: 3 star
Translated Body: 3 star

Author: Harvard_Bob
Subject: Broken - Fix iOS Bookmarks Can't Sort or Move
Body: Hey iOS developers. Thanks for the hard work you do, but when are you going to fix bookmarks on the iOS platform? Great concept the idea of synced bookmarks across Firefox on multiple platforms. Implementation is poor however. All iOS Firefox can seem to do is dump mobile saved bookmarks into one location underneath the Desktop folder. The folder labeled Mobile Bookmarks will show no bookmarks whatsoever. I have seen questions going back to years on this topic and yet no one seems to address it. Why?

Author: Shsh1928655
Subject: Complementos
Body: Deberían activar los complementos como en la versión de android son muy útiles
Translated Body: Should activate the plugins as in the android version are very useful

Author: Xivilain
Subject: Great for sync for bookmarks on the go
Body: I bookmark lots of crap. And it's nice to whip those up anytime and show family or friends on my phone when I visit them. And vice versa, it's nice to bookmark something I find on mobile and then retrieve it later on desktop.

Author: chm1
Subject: Great mobile browser
Body: I would recommend this as an alternative to Safari. Some sites don't function as well on certain browsers, so it's good to have a backup. I also like the innovation of night mode in a recent update.

Author: xalatprime
Subject: Mein Favorit!
Body:
Firefox ist seit jeher mein Favorit bei den Browsern. Die Umsetzung des Browsers im iOS finde ich sehr gelungen. Der Browser ist schnell, zuverlässig, perfektes zoomen, Sync funktioniert, das Design gefällt mir sehr, etc.

Das einzige was mich stört, ist die Tatsache, dass man im iOS keine Add-ons verwenden kann. Firefox und Add-ons müssen einfach einhergehen. Ich verstehe es nicht, warum Apple uns die Add-ons verweigert. Ich hoffe, dass wir baldigst die Add-ons verwenden können auf unseren Apple-Geräten.

P.S.: Nein, dass soll keine Kritik gegen Mozilla sein sondern gegen Apple.
Translated Body: Firefox has always been my favorite among browsers. The implementation of the browser in the iOS I find very successful. The browser is fast, reliable, perfect zoom, sync works, I like the design very much, etc. The only thing that bothers me is the fact that iOS can not use any add-ons. Firefox and add-ons need to be easy. I do not understand why Apple denies us the add-ons. I hope that soon we can use the add-ons on our Apple devices. PS: No, that is no criticism against Mozilla but against Apple.

Author: limera1mn
Subject: Ottima app
Body: Ho atteso a lungo che Firefox arrivasse su IOS e per fortuna non ha deluso. Mancano ancora parecchie funzioni ma essendo una new entry posso capirlo.
Translated Body: I waited long for Firefox to arrive on IOS and luckily did not disappoint. There are still several functions but being a new entry I can understand it.

Author: Telephotonc
Subject: Dumb browser
Body: After updating on August 4, I've been getting messages from FB saying my browser doesn't support their app and that I need to update.

Author: AceNya
Subject: History etc...what happened?
Body: App no longer recording my history or commonly used tabs. Rather irritating as it's far more convenient for it to remember at least SOMETHING. what happened?

Author: Zapp Rowsdower
Subject: AVOID LIKE THE PLAGUE
Body:
Mozilla Firefox has now teamed up with George Soros to "combat fake news" by essentially censoring any information that THEY deem "unacceptable". 

I am now permanently uninstalling firefox, never using it again, and I hope you are all smart enough to do the same.

Author: Dz27
Subject: Needs Improvements
Body:
The bookmarks section is spectacularly anti intuitive. It doesn't allow for new bookmarks to be placed in folders, nor can you create bookmark folders from within the app. In fact there are no folders at all unless you sync FF with your desktop. If you do sync FF with your desktop, you'll have access to the bookmarks folders created on your desktop, but the app still doesn't allow new bookmarks to be placed inside these folders, placing them instead in a separate Mobile Bookmarks folder. The "native" folders, namely Bookmarks Menu, Bookmarks Toolbar, Mobile Bookmarks and Unsorted Bookmarks, are all inside the Desktop Bookmarks folder and can neither be renamed, deleted or edited in any way rendering them useless. Yes, you read that right: There's an Unsorted Bookmarks folder that you cannot sort, and the Mobile Bookmarks folder is inside the Desktop Bookmarks folder. 

The app is also incapable of playing video content from the BBC.

A third improvement would be that the Reading View presents the article full screen as the "banner" above is too big in an iPhone screen.

Other than that it's a great browser. Keep up the good work!

Author: SSPbr
Subject: Safari is great, but so is Firefox on iOS
Body:
I started trying different browsers on my desktop over the last week due to the firing of James Damore from Google. 

After downloading Firefox Focus (which is fantastic for private browsing), I decided to download Firefox too on my iPhone. I haven’t used it since 2011 on the desktop. 

I was very impressed at how Firefox has improved so much over the years. The first thing I noticed is that it was much smoother and slicker than it used to be. Secondly (and one of the main reasons I moved to Chrome in the first place) is that it now has a great bookmark synchronisation feature. The fact that I don’t have to use a 3rd party bookmark sync service like xmarks is great. I never liked thos1e clunky Firefox add-ons from 3rd parties and the extensions store still looks pretty bad even in 2017.

One of the best things I noticed when I looked at the Mozilla website was that they also have Pocket as a bookmarking product. I have heard of pocket before but the fact that it is owned by Mozilla and the fact that I could sign up for it using my Firefox account was a bonus. I started using it within 10 minutes of using Firefox and I love pocket. It is a much better service than Delicious and I may even subscribe for the premium version if I start to integrate Pocket into my workflow 100% (all new habits take time!)

Overall, well done Firefox. The massive improvements made over the years will ensure that I start to use Firefox daily for work and especially Pocket as a personal and work content repository.

Author: SgtDox
Subject: Bis vor neustem Update (August17) funktionierte noch alles.
Body: Habe diesen Browser immer gerne genutzt.  Seit dem neustem Update schließt er sich nach dem öffnen immer, läuft allerdings im Hintergrund weiter.  Firefox ist damit leider nutzlos.  Hilfeforum hat mir nach zehn Minuten Suche auch nicht weitergeholfen.
Translated Subject: Until before a very recent update (August17) everything still worked.
Translated Body: Have this browser always gladly used. Since the latest update, he always closes after opening, but continues in the background. Firefox is unfortunately useless. Helpforum did not help me after ten minutes search.

Author: xsmo99
Subject: Es geht voran!
Body:
Update 15.08.17:
Es tut sich immer mehr und Firefox macht einen immer besseren Job. Jetzt sogar mit integriertem QR Code Reader - top!

Update 03.04.17:
Mittlerweile hat Mozilla nachgebessert und die Tab Verwaltung endlich am iPad verbessert. Weiter so!

Ursprüngliche Rezension:

Am iPhone finde ich die App einigermaßen gelungen, am iPad dafür aber umso weniger.

Es gibt keine Keyboard Shortcuts wie am PC oder Mobile Safari, zudem ist die Tab Verwaltung am iPad nicht effektiv. Man sollte dort wie am PC, Safari iOS / Chrome / usw. eine extra Leiste hinzufügen, damit man zwischen den Tabs mit nur einem anstatt zwei Klicks wechseln kann.

Sobald diese Verbesserungen in einem zukünftigem App Update vorgenommen wurden, werde ich meine Bewertung ändern und 5 Sterne geben.
Translated Body: Update 15.08.17: It is getting more and more and Firefox is doing a better job. Now even with integrated QR Code Reader - top! Update 03.04.17: Meanwhile, Mozilla has improved and the Tab administration finally improved on the iPad. Keep it up! Original review: On the iPhone I find the app a lot, but the iPad on the other hand, the less so. There are no keyboard shortcuts like on the PC or Mobile Safari, and the Tab administration on the iPad is not effective. You should add there as on the PC, Safari iOS / Chrome / etc an extra bar, so you can switch between the tabs with only one instead of two clicks. Once these improvements are made in a future app update, I will change my rating and give 5 stars.

Author: ohaidan
Subject: Needs improvements in Bookmarking, history/cache settings, FF Sync, and personalization
Body:
I use Firefox as my primary browser on my laptop, tablet, and mobile device. I find the "FF Sync" useful, in that, it backups and pushes bookmarks and tabs to all my devices- It could benefit from some improvement though.

Same goes for Firefox Mobile- your bookmarking lacks organizational tools and your settings within the browser are lacking quite a bit. 

I cannot clear my regular cache/history upon closing a tab, unless it is a private tab. There is no setting where I can say "do not remember my history, etc" either. Why not? I don't know. 

Ya'll gotta get to work!

Author: Calebffhchjchkg
Subject: Incredible
Body: Firefox is the best browser across all platforms. It is faster than chrome, opera, or any other browsers on the internet. It is also the most secure, simple, and respectful to your privacy. I really like the QR code scanner, and the "top sites" page that is basically a Firefox-modified version of Opera's Iconic feature, Speed Dial.

Subject: Última actualización Agosto de 2017
Body: Voy a tener que desinstalarlo muy a mí pesar porque en esta última actualización no abre la app, le doy para abrirla y parece que vaya abrir y se cierra al instante. 😔
Translated Body: I'm going to have to uninstall it very much to my regret because in this last update does not open the app, I give it to open it and it seems to open and close instantly. (I.e.

Subject: Hugely overrated
Body:
Horrible layout. 
Everything ugly and looks outdated. 
Bad add-ons.
In general not pleasant to use.

Subject: Touch ID
Body: It doesn't get lock and unlocked with Touch ID

Author: Kromler
Subject: Стал вылетать
Body: И не показывает страницы. Просто серый фон.
Translated Body: And does not show the page. Just a gray background.

Author: TomS82
Subject: Schlechtes Update
Body: Nach Update alle Inhalte weg und Zugangsdaten gelöscht
Translated Body: After updating all content removed and access data deleted

Author: Bernhard Bühner
Subject: Favoriten bearbeiten
Body: Die Favoriten lassen sich nicht einzeln entfernen.
Translated Body: The favorites can not be removed individually.

Author: rezzess
Subject: Schade, aber weshalb...
Body: ....lassen sich die Lesezeichen nicht ordnen bzw. hoch oder runterschieben. Das wär ein Fortschritt.
Translated Body: .... the bookmarks can not be arranged or pushed up or down. That would be a step forward.

Author: ManticoreNL
Subject: Not always responsive
Body:
The App is not always very responsive, there are sometimes delays of several seconds or the App just freezes but not entirely crashes.

Using it on a 6s iOS 10.3.3.

Request: i would like night mode to a black themed skin, the night mode that is offered is similar as iOS night mode and does not offer anything superior.

Author: andencoth
Subject: App continually crashes upon attempting to open!!
Body:
So, even this last Aug. 16 update still does not open! It still hangs and then crashes. Sorry Mozilla, but I think it's time I go elsewhere. Hate this!!
--------------------------------------------------------------
Sorry, but even this Aug. 3rd update does not work!! Still crashes when attempting to open! Latest ios on iPad 4.
Help!!
--------------------------------------------------------------

Please fix ASAP!

New update still does not work! App still crashes on attempting to open! This is on an IPAD 4. Please try again!!

Author: Dane73
Subject: Please the Remove New Tab Popup!
Body:
Please remove that annoying blue notification that pops up every time I open a new tab.

I don't need the app to tell me I opened a new tab. I loved Firefox until that notification was added. Now it's just too annoying to use.

I guess I'm just going back to Dolphin. Firefox was my favorite browser until that new tab notification became a thing in version 7.0 I think.

Author: Mjconk
Subject: Well, I tried...
Body: I've been using Firefox exclusively on my PC for many years. So, I thought I'd install it on my 7+, with iOS 10.3.3. I immediately got error pages saying it's not a mobile version. Jeesh! Guess I'll go back to Safari or bing until Mozilla gets their act together.

Author: ニックネームってめんどい
Subject: 消える
Body:
タブを2個開いて1個目のタブに戻ろうしたら消えるんだけど。
更新するけど、ダメっぽいし
いちいちタブ消して新しく開いて面倒い
Translated Body: I will disappear after opening two tabs and returning to the first tab. I update it, but it seems like it is useless, it disappears and it opens a new one and it is troublesome

Author: Shraga!bz
Subject: Crashes on launch.  🤕  Can't use it anymore
Body:
Nope.... still crashes 😱
If you have many tabs open, don't install this update.
Still crashes... (update 8.2)

Author: Handyandy,jr
Subject: Way too cumbersome
Body: Have been a devoted user of Firefox on Windows for years but this app is nothing like the desktop version.  Got the app so that I would have access to my bookmarks on an iPad when on the road.  Wow, what a pain!  The number of steps you have to take just to FIND your bookmarks is absurd.  Then, to switch to a different bookmark you have to go through the whole multiple step process all over again.  I will keep the app just in case I need access to a bookmark but there is no way I can use this as my 'everyday' browser.  Will continue to use Safari.

Author: JustinTray
Subject: Finally found an app for modifying my eBay variations
Body:
Been looking and looking for an app that will not bug out when you confronted with JavaScript. This app works like a charm for modifying my eBay variations that used to constantly scroll on safari and other browsers.
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Author: sdhoon1227
Subject: 생각보다 많이 만족스럽습니다.
Body:
모바일 크롬의 ux가 상당히 완성된 편이라 생각했는데
모바일 파폭이 크롬처럼 화려한(?)기능은 없는데 기본기가 상당히 충실하네요. 

일단 크롬에 비해 여러 탭 보기가 좋습니다. 
크롬은 카드형식이라 탭이 많아질 경우 찾기가 굉장히 어려운데 파폭은 바둑판 배열이라 가독성이 아주 좋네요. 

이외에도 주소창에서 바로 주요 사이트의 검색기능을 사용할 수 있는것과 뉴탭을 열었을 때 나오는 히스토리가 크롬의 동기능에 비해 훨씬 유용하네요.
Translated Subject: I am more satisfied than I thought.
Translated Body: I thought that mobile ux ux is quite complete, but mobile is not as brilliant as Chrome. It's better to have multiple tab views compared to Chrome. Chrome is a card format, so if you have a lot of tabs, it's very difficult to find it. In addition, the ability to use the search function of the main site directly from the address bar and the history when opening a new tab is much more useful than the function of chrome.

In addition, the ability to use the search function of the main site directly from the address bar and the history when opening a new tab is much more useful than the function of chrome.

Author: TerribleNewUINeedFixing
Subject: Terrible New UI
Body:
The old UI was much better than this clunky broken mess. I used to love the Firefox app but now it's a broken mess. 

The old UI was much better and less cumbersome. Please developers I don't know what our doing, but you need to revert to the old UI, you're trying to fix something that's not broken and in the wake are now breaking it.

The safari app, or the opera browser is much better than this, and this used to be the best browser app up until that latest drew updates.

I do not recommend until Firefox gets it together and fixes the bow broken clunky UI.

Author: Rhzyak
Subject: It's coming along, small issues
Body: The new tab notification is nice, but the blue color is a bit jarring █ Login credentials are still insecure by automatically filling without the asking for a passcode █ I enjoy the new long-tap UI for bookmarks, wanted this for a long time

Author: TommyJenkinsTV
Subject: Great
Body: I love the private browsing

Author: PennyLa123!!
Subject: Love it
Body: Must download best thing ever

Author: Trump has a new video game
Subject: Recommended
Body: This is a great replacement for Safari

Author: 很肥的波波
Subject: 不太好用，不过为了同步
Body: 桌面端一直在用，国产的几个浏览器实在是不想吐槽
Translated Subject: Not very easy to use, but in order to synchronize
Translated Body: Desktop has been in use, several domestic browser is really do not want Tucao

Author: Astaritus
Subject: Обновление
Body:
Стабильный браузер. Но как до обновления так и после - некоторые страницы стали не прогружаться. Точнее предзагрузка с прорисовкой страницы появляется, а затем БАЦ! И серый экран. Очень часто с Mirf.ru такое модно встретить.
Очень огорчила новая фишка с "интересными статьями", к которым можно вернутся. Занимает лишнее место на экране. К тому же мозолит глаза. По сути является вкладкой "история" - но на главной странице. Буду признателен, если бы её убрали, либо сделали эту опцию отключаемой.
Translated Body: Stable browser. But both before the update and after - some pages were not downloaded. Precisely preloading with the page drawing appears, and then BAC! And the gray screen. Very often with Mirf.ru it is fashionable to meet. Very disappointed with the new feature with "interesting articles", to which you can return. It takes up too much space on the screen. In addition, my eyes are corn. In fact, it is the tab "history" - but on the main page. I would be grateful if it were removed, or made this option disabled.

Author: Jack and Sam
Subject: 最高！でも…
Body:
Firefoxがiphoneでも使えて便利です！！
今回のアップデートのqrコード読み取り機能は愛用できます^_^
しかし…アドオンが使えないのは特に残念です…
せめて需要の高いアドオンを追加できるように、特にublock origin等は追加できるようにしてほしいです。
また、アドオンも使えないにしては容量が大きいです…
Androidの時も愛用していましたが、550mbを超えたことはなかったので正直驚いています、軽容量化と、ublock origin導入、検討お願いします。
Translated Body: Firefox can be used even on iphone and is useful! It is! I can favorably use the qr code reading function of this update ^ _ ^ But it is particularly disappointing that addons can not be used ... At the very least I would like you to be able to add ublock origin etc., especially so that you can add add - ons with high demand . Also, if you can not use add-ons as well, the capacity is large ... I used to patronize on Android, but I was honestly surprised because it never exceeded 550 mb, introduction of light capacity, introduction of ublock origin, consideration To do.

Author: Surfeurrapide
Subject: Enfin un navigateur libre et pas intrusif +++
Body:
La dernière version est excellente et sur mon iPhone je n'utilise plus que Firefox

Je souhaitai depuis longtemps un navigateur sur iPhone qui respecte ma vie privée et soit efficace. C'est fait. Il bloque bien les pub et les cookies sur mon iPhone. Très fluide et bien conçu. Très ergonomique aussi. 
La synchronisation entre mes deux PC sous Windows 10 et mon iPhone 6S par Firefox est parfaite en plus. 
On peut le déclarer comme navigateur par défaut dans Outlook. 
À recommander. 
À quand une version Tor?
Translated Subject: Finally a free browser and not intrusive +++
Translated Body: The last version is excellent and on my iPhone I only use Firefox I have long wanted a browser on iPhone that respects my privacy and is effective. It is done. It blocks ads and cookies on my iPhone. Very fluid and well designed. Very ergonomic too. The synchronization between my two PCs under Windows 10 and my iPhone 6S by Firefox is perfect in addition. It can be declared as the default browser in Outlook. To recommend. When is a Tor version?

Author: viteixeira
Subject: Vem melhorando.
Body: Ainda falar habilitar a edição dos favoritos, de modo a permitir o agrupamento em pastas e a edição das posições.
Translated Body: Still talking about enabling the editing of bookmarks, in order to allow grouping in folders and edit positions.

Author: norbert.kapuy
Subject: Fast n Nice
Body: Really fast and nice browser.

Subject: Skip this update
Body: Slow and repeatedly hangs and crashes. This update is virtually unusable for me.

Author: 竹やぶの中
Subject: ブックマークのリストが並び替えられない
Body: トップサイトのデザインは良くなったと思う。
Translated Subject: The list of bookmarks can not be rearranged
Translated Body: I think the design of the top site is getting better.

Author: Sam Enerve
Subject: Gestion des favoris toujours à la ramasse!
Body:
On en est à la version 8.2 et on ne peut toujours pas avoir un gestionnaire des favoris utilisable!
Impossible de choisir leur emplacement ni de les déplacer une fois créés!
Pourquoi distinguer les favoris "sur l'ordinateur" des ceux "sur le téléphone" alors que ceux qu'on ajoute ne vont ni dans l'un ni dans l'autre?
Du coup, pourquoi les synchroniser avec la version bureau si ceux créés depuis iOS ne le seront pas???
Le concept de données unifiées n'est pas encore arrivé chez Mozilla, et apparemment personne chez vous n'utilise cette appli... on vous comprend, Chrome et Safari sont tellement plus pratique!

Alors arrêtez de mettre des stagiaires sur ce projet et prenez-le au sérieux où vous allez disparaitre du web: avec moins de 15% d'utilisateurs ça va aller très vite 😥
Translated Subject: Managing favorites always pick it up!
Translated Body: We are in version 8.2 and we still can not have a usable favorites manager! Unable to choose their location or move them once created! Why distinguish the favorites "on the computer" from those "on the phone" while those that are added do not go in either one? So why sync them with the desktop version if those created from iOS will not be ??? The concept of unified data has not yet arrived at Mozilla, and apparently nobody at home uses this app ... you understand, Chrome and Safari are so much more convenient! So stop putting trainees on this project and take it seriously where you will disappear from the web: with less than 15% of users it will go very fast 😥

Author: edwardtilbury
Subject: Soros 1984 censorship built-in
Body: I'll use brace or opera, I don't like having a police state built in to my browser

Author: LikesAGoodMoan
Subject: So much for privacy
Body:
How can Firefox claim to be protecting my privacy with this browser? It doesn't even have any cookie controls, like blocking third party cookies. It claims to block sites that track you, but there's no way to check if this works because the app won't even show me what cookies are on my phone.

Stick with Safari and you get all these missing features. Firefox is just a worse browser, but misleads users into thinking it is on their side. Avoid!

Subject: Love this
Body: Love this app so much best web browser

- no sync option for bookmarks that does not use some third party servers

Body: When switching back to a tab, the tab is all gray. Refreshing the tab does nothing. I have to close the tab and re enter the web address to get it to work.

Subject: I like it
Body: I went to the App Store to download Mercury Browser, and Firefox was the first result (couldn't find Mercury... not sure why). Didn't know that Firefox was available for iOS. I use it off and on on my laptop (I mainly use Chrome unless I need to use a helpful extension on Firefox). Will try the iOS version of Firefox out some more on my iPhone. So far so good.

Author: matkaz1003
Subject: Niezła, ale nie idealna
Body: Przeglądarka generalnie robi, co ma robić. Mogłaby działać nieco szybciej, zwłaszcza kiedy otwartych jest więcej kart. Czasem potrafi się sama zamknąć - zaskakująco często wtedy, kiedy na boku mam uruchomioną inną aplikację. Od jakiegoś czasu widok "nowa karta" ma nowy układ. Sekcja "Odwiedź ponownie" pokazuje jednak jakieś dawno nieważne i nieinteresujące mnie strony, na które wchodziłem może rok temu. Zdecydowanie wymaga to poprawy. Uważam też, że wygodnie by było gdyby karty otwarte na innych urządzeniach były bardziej wyeksponowane i nieco bardziej aktualne.
Translated Body: The browser generally does what it's supposed to do. It could work a bit faster, especially when more cards are open. Sometimes he can close himself - surprisingly often when I have another application on my side. For some time, the "new card" view has a new layout. The "Revisit" section, however, shows some long-forgotten and uninteresting pages I entered maybe a year ago. It definitely needs improvement. I also think it would be convenient if the cards opened on other devices were more prominent and somewhat more up-to-date.
