Author: Krellius
Subject: Garbage now
Body: Used to be the best browser but now Firefox is complete trash. Avoid and get a better browser.

Author: BitingChaos
Subject: What a joke.
Body:
Cannot rename or edit bookmarks. You have to edit bookmarks from a Desktop computer, then sync them to mobile. 

No easy way to view bookmarks. Why? You cannot open bookmarks when looking at the current tab, you have to open the tab switcher, then open up a menu, then view bookmarks. Not the icon that looks like a book (no, thats the "Reading" button). The star button hidden on the popup menu hidden on the tab switcher screen is where the bookmarks are hidden. 

Also, why not have some sort of adblock? Safari and Opera both block ads, both sync bookmarks, and both let me edit bookmarks. Why would I want to use Firefox instead of Safari or Opera?

This is a poor browser, from developers that don't seem to know what they are doing, all coming from a DYING company.

Sad.

Author: turkicnomad
Subject: Needs improvements
Body:
Coming from Chrome and looking for a more private experience, unfortunately I think Chrome still has the better UX. It's small stuff but it could really streamline the experience, like opening tabs on the bookmark bar. Or syncing history over multiple devices sorted by multiple devices. Hell, as insignificant as this, I appreciate that chrome's QR code reader can be accessed by 3D touching that app rather than having to totally pull up Firefox. 

I haven't experienced stability issues yet, but I haven't put this application through the ringer.

Author: emtdgranny
Subject: First two star rating!
Body: So I gave it a two star rating because it's not that bad for a one star but it is also not that great. I pretty much have the same critiques as the majority, but I have yet to see them say anything about the tabs and being able to drag them to reorganize them. That would be a big help as I like to keep tabs constantly open, but because I can not move them around I end up closing them by accident.

Author: Pages für iPhone / iPad
Subject: Wo sind meine Bookmarks?
Body:
Nach einer Empfehlung auf meinem Mac gab ich dem Firefox auf dem iPad eine neue Chance.
Wo bleibt das Menü?
Warum sind keine Passwörter synchronisiert?
Weiterhin bleibt Safari der alternativlose Browser. Firefox fliegt wieder raus.
Translated Body: After a recommendation on my Mac, I gave the Firefox on the iPad a new chance. Where is the menu? Why are no passwords synchronized? Safari remains an alternative browser. Firefox flies out again.

Subject: Love it
Body: Been using Firefox for years and I got it the day it came out on iOS. I really love it and only wish it had one thing that is really starting to irritate me like crazy. I wish I had the ability to 'Open in Firefox' from other apps. That's the only request I ask for, other than that I love it.

Subject: Just keeps crashing
Body: It just keeps crashing

Zwei Fingerbedienungen erzeugen eine Art ruckeln!

Subject: Убого как то
Body:
При обновлении страницы возвращаться к месту обновления
Промотка выключается в половине случаев. 
Впечатление недоделанности
Translated Body: When updating the page, go back to the update site. The winding is turned off in half the cases. Impression of unfinishedness

Author: Gaz72
Subject: In need of improvement
Body:
Not a bad browser. Not great either.

Main gripe - I've no idea what the point is of the tab which declares 'Be on the lookout'? It's just an annoyance. I already have bookmarks, why do I want to be constantly reminded of my recent browsing history?? An option to turn this off would be great as I'm constantly having to clear my web history to get rid.

Author: Bastian1986
Subject: Seit letztem Update fast unbrauchbar
Body:
Bis zum letzten Update ein klasse Browser, Schnell, zuverlässig, gut.

Seit dem letzten Update hängt alles, alles ist unheimlich langsam, gerne hängt sich der komplette Browser auch auf.
Gespeicherte Login Daten funktionieren mal und mal nicht.

Alles in allem nicht wirklich schön. Hoffentlich wird dies bald korrigiert, ansonsten muss Safari wieder her halten...
Translated Body: Until the last update a great browser, Fast, reliable, good. Since the last update, everything depends, everything is incredibly slow, gladly the whole browser depends on. Stored login data does not work sometimes. All in all not really nice. Hopefully, this will be corrected soon, otherwise it will have to restore Safari ...

Author: Морга
Subject: Да вроде ничего
Body:
Промотка выключается в половине случаев. 
Впечатление недоделанности
Translated Body: The winding turns off in half the cases. Impression of unfinishedness

Author: DisgruntledCustomer5379754
Subject: stupid Top sites change
Body: why did you change the Top sites page? everything was fine until some idiot decided to add a list of visited pages - what is the History for then?? at least make that an option. did you import some brainless microsoft strategists for this change?

Author: ☆ぽよぽよ☆
Subject: パスコードの機能の意味
Body: なぜパスコードの設定(即時)をしても、パスコード入力画面にならずにそのまま中身が見れてしまう状態になってしまうのでしょうか
Translated Body: Why will it become a state in which the contents will be seen as it is without becoming a passcode input screen even if setting the passcode (immediate)?

Author: law23
Subject: ganz gut
Body:
Am Desktop ist Firefox mein Liebling, am iPhone jedoch ist Safari etwas besser umgesetzt und schneller. Lediglich Firefox sync hat Mehrwert gegenüber Safari.
Die Auswahl der Favoriten sollte direkt vom Startbildschirm möglich sein, nicht über Untermenüs.
Translated Body: On the desktop, Firefox is my favorite, but on the iPhone Safari is a bit better implemented and faster. Only Firefox sync has added value compared to Safari. The selection of the favorites should be possible directly from the start screen, not via submenus.

Author: Keirgulf
Subject: EZ 2 Dwnload & Set Up!
Body: I prefer Firefox over Chrome and IE

Author: tsh69
Subject: Seit dem letzten Update teilweise sehr träge
Body:
Vor allem, wenn man eine URL eintippen will, gibt es oft sekundenlang keine Reaktion. Das macht die Bedienung dann zur Qual. Kann man das nicht wieder irgendwie beschleunigen? Den History-/Bookmark-Sync, auf den der Browser da scheinbar wartet, irgendwie im Hintergrund vornehmen?

Ansonsten finde ich es toll, dass es Firefox auch für iOS gibt, so dass meine Bookmarks und besuchten Seiten alle schön synchron sind. Passwörter synchronisiere ich allerdings nicht.
Translated Subject: Since the last update partly very sluggish
Translated Body: Especially if you want to enter a URL, there is often no reaction for seconds. This makes the operation then to the agony. Can not that be accelerated somehow? The history / bookmark sync on which the browser seems to be waiting somehow in the background? Otherwise, I find it great that Firefox is also available for iOS, so my bookmarks and pages are all nicely synchronized. Passwords synonymous, I do not synonymous.

Author: law23
Subject: ganz gut
Body:
Am Desktop ist Firefox mein Liebling, am iPhone jedoch ist Safari etwas besser strukturiert und schneller. Lediglich Firefox sync hat somit Mehrwert gegenüber Safari.
Die Auswahl der Favoriten sollte direkt vom Startbildschirm möglich sein, nicht über Untermenüs. Die Funktion Suchmaschinen für Schnellsuche finde ich unnötig. Ebenso sollte eine gewisse Länderanpassung stattfinden - wenn man in der Adressleiste die ersten ein bis zwei Buchstaben der www Adresse eingibt, erscheinen US Vorschläge (Autovervollständigung). Diese Funktion lässt sich gar nicht deaktivieren.
Translated Body: On the desktop Firefox is my favorite, but on the iPhone Safari is somewhat better structured and faster. Only Firefox sync thus has added value compared to Safari. The selection of the favorites should be possible directly from the start screen, not via submenus. The search engines for quick search I find unnecessary. Likewise, a certain country adjustment should take place - if one enters in the address bar the first one to two letters of the www address, US proposals appear (auto-completion). This function can not be deactivated at all.

Author: wildeling
Subject: Firefox on mobile
Body: What else can one say? It's the good old Firefox on mobile! I hope you guys find a way to include some add ons like the ones you have in the desktop application.

Author: Mr Farnon
Subject: Great for desktop but terrible on mobile devies
Body: No selections internet favourites importing possible. You have to import them al of nothing! No delete of specific favourites possible. Terrible user interface. In general not very easy to use and a lot of tools just missing. I remover it from iPad and iPhone and Use only the desktop version

Author: law23
Subject: ganz gut
Body:
Am Desktop ist Firefox mein Liebling, am iPhone jedoch ist Safari etwas besser strukturiert und schneller. Lediglich Firefox sync hat somit Mehrwert gegenüber Safari.
Die Funktion Suchmaschinen für Schnellsuche finde ich unnötig. Ebenso sollte eine gewisse Länderanpassung stattfinden - wenn man in der Adressleiste die ersten ein bis zwei Buchstaben der www Adresse eingibt, erscheinen US Vorschläge (Autovervollständigung). Diese Funktion lässt sich gar nicht deaktivieren.
Translated Body: On the desktop Firefox is my favorite, but on the iPhone Safari is somewhat better structured and faster. Only Firefox sync thus has added value compared to Safari. The search engines for quick search I find unnecessary. Likewise, a certain country adjustment should take place - if one enters in the address bar the first one to two letters of the www address, US proposals appear (auto-completion). This function can not be deactivated at all.

Subject: noch viel zu tun
Body:
Zunächst: schön, dass es Firefox auf iOS gibt. Aber es gibt noch viel zu tun.

Positiv
* Firefox sync erlaubt einfache Synchronisation zwischen verschiedenen Geräten (mobile und desktop)

Negativ
* Firefox sync synct nicht wie man vlt erwarten könnte die offenen Tabs zwischen den Geräten (es läßt sich der Verlauf syncen aber eben nicht die offenen Tabs)
* bookmarks können nicht in ihrer Reihenfolge bearbeitet werden
* bei Login-Feldern wird keine Option zum Einsetzen eines Inhaltes aus der Zwischenablage angezeigt
Translated Body: Next: nice that there is Firefox on iOS. But there is still much to be done. * Firefox sync allows easy synchronization between different devices (mobile and desktop) Negative * Firefox sync synct not how you could expect vlt the open tabs between the devices (it can sync the history but not the open tabs) * bookmarks can not In their order * Login fields do not display an option to insert a content from the clipboard

In particular at least I want to be able to add ublock origin etc. so that add-ons with high demand can be added . Also, the capacity is large if you can not use add-ons too ... Author: WebThingy
Subject: Good & Bad
Body:
I really wish you would allow private browsing by default, and Focus is not the answer. Brave really has it down, you can turn things on and off as you wish, better control over defaults, without having to make two browsers.
I love Firefox on Desktop but the mobile version leaves me frustrated.
That said, it's pretty fast and loads some pages other mobile browsers won't.

Author: Isaac Gray
Subject: Needs UI tweaking and Adblocking integration
Body:
Dear Mozilla,

This is a product with tons of opportunities. The custom search engine script is amazing, and finally allows me to use a custom search query for a trustworthy engine (StartPage). This finally pulls me away from the control of Google. However, some tweaks would make it a better product on iPad and iPhone:

1) Add Adblocking ability from Firefox Focus. I realize that it is no small feat as Apple does not allow Firefox iOS to use the apple scripts for Adblocking, but adopting the block lists to the fully fledged app would be a gift to all.

2) Make bookmarks editable (renamable) and their order organizable. Currently you can only delete or open them in a new tab as options. It's not a mature feature set.

3) Move the new tab button on the tab viewing page from the bottom left to the bottom right. This keeps you from having to travel the diagonal from the tab button (upper right) to the opposite (bottom left) corner, switching hands. Useful on iPad, VERY USEFUL for iPhone use, which is often one handed.

4) the pin to top sites feature only allows one link to the domain of choice. If I want to have a link to my Amazon Orders, that will take over the general Amazon.com link. Make this more like the safari Favorites tab! There's no need to reinvent the wheel. Customization, privacy, and autonomy should be the hallmark of Firefox. Not some gimmicky, clunky suggested websites. What if I visit an illicit website and don't want to worry about it poppin up in a new tab?? I get it, use private browsing mode, but the suggested websites panel should be an option you can disable.

Lots of potential, but the app needs some streamlining and more options for the user. Apple locks us down, but Mozilla can potentially set us free.

Author: navinc17
Subject: Хороший браузер
Body: Работает стабильно, много функций, включая ночной режим и приватные вкладки. Есть синхронизация с десктопной версией закладок и паролей. Из недостатков, отсутствует фильтр рекламы, неудобно размещать вкладки в топе сайтов, поскольку нельзя их свободно перемещать, при переустановке топ сайтов не сохраняется. Хорошо еще сделать функцию "не отслеживать".
Translated Body: Works stably, many functions, including night mode and private tabs. There is a synchronization with the desktop version of bookmarks and passwords. Of the shortcomings, there is no filter ads, it is inconvenient to place tabs in the top of the site, because you can not move them freely, when reinstalling the top sites is not saved. It's good to do the "do not track" function.

Author: ctf760
Subject: Works, needs more features
Body:
Works, but needs more features. Here are my suggested features:

-Addons like Android version
-Ad Blocker
-Ability to set rules for cookies and history like desktop version
-Better layout
-Guest Sessions like Android Version
-Save as PDF like Android Version
-Restore Tabs like Android Version
-Addon ProtonMail to the list of supported email apps

Add that, reduce the amount of crashes, and you have a 5 star browser.

Body: Сделайте,пожалуйста,возможность управлять закладками и создавать папки.Неудобно.

Author: CitrusGamer101
Subject: Great app! Very fast!
Body: This is a great browser to use on your IOS. It's fast, reliable and is very clean and nicer on the eyes. It could do with a clear history button, because if I'm done looking at images, I don't want to keep swiping then pressing delete over and over. But I still suggest getting the app!

Subject: Schrott hoch 10
Body: Total unübersichtlich und daher unbrauchbar. Der Designer sollte definitiv noch mal zur Nachprüfung antreten. Firefox am PC ist echt top, aber als App: setzen 6, danke und tschüss
Translated Body: Totally unclear and therefore useless. The designer should definitely go to the review again. Firefox on the PC is really top, but as App: 6, thank you and bye

Author: Don't look any further
Subject: Very Frustrating
Body:
I'm a great fan of Firefox but find their "support" extremely frustrating. There is a forum but questions there can go unanswered and from there they fall into a Firefox black hole. 

Secondly as far as I understand you can not sync you bookmarks can NOT be synced between your iOS devices and a Mac. That's ridiculous. If I am wrong about this I'd like someone to correct me. But there's no Mozilla support person that is available. 

This all started with me wanting to know how to create bookmark folders in the iOS app. 

Spent 1.5 hours trying to find the answers. Too bad. No one is home at Mozilla.

Author: tsh69
Subject: Ganz okay, aber teilweise Reaktion sehr langsam
Body:
Vor allem, wenn man nur mal schnell etwas nachgucken möchte, und kurz nach dem Start des Browsers eine URL eintippen möchte, dauert es manchmal bis zu 10 Sekunden, bis der Browser reagiert. Das muss dringend verbessert werden.

Auch verschiedene Dinge sind einfach noch nicht gut gelöst. Zum Beispiel die Lesezeichenverwaltung ist noch ein großes Manko.

Insgesamt aber bin ich glücklich, dass ich meine umfangreiche Lesezeichensammlung und meine History jetzt auch mobil immer dabei habe.
Translated Subject: Okay, but partial response very slow
Translated Body: Especially, if you just want to look for something quickly, and shortly after the start of the browser a URL would like to enter, it sometimes takes up to 10 seconds until the browser responds. This needs urgent improvement. Also, different things are simply not yet solved well. For example bookmark management is still a big drawback. But overall, I am happy that I have my extensive book collection collection and my history now also mobile.

Author: iPlaySign
Subject: Bug Report
Body: Lässt sich leider in der aktuellen Version auf dem iPhone SE nicht einmal mehr öffnen. Die Bewertung wird selbstverständlich mit Fehlerbehebung bearbeitet.
Translated Body: Unfortunately, in the current version on the iPhone SE is not even open. The evaluation will be handled by Troubleshooting.

Author: Crash Pad
Subject: Not the best browser.
Body: This browser doesn't replicate the experience of the desktop version. There are too few options - not enough privacy options like blocking 3rd party cookies and 'do not track' option. At least with Safari iOS, you can add a content blocker to block ads and other trackers. I like that you can set a default search engine as some mobile browsers annoyingly don't allow this. I've never been a fan of Top Sites as it displays your most visited sites rather than a fully customised set of sites. Even if you pin sites to it, there's no way to reorder them. At least with the desktop version there's the option to install a Speed Dial plugin. Overall, quite disappointing.

Author: Heri76
Subject: Nefunguje synchronizace
Body: Bohuzel zklamani uz po instalaci. Nefunguje synchronizace oblibenych polozek apod pomoci Sync. Uz pri pokusu o prihlaseni do Firefoxu to opakovane hlasi, ze stranku nelze nacist:-( Vzhledem k pouziti synchronizace mezi dalsimi mymi PC a telefonem je to u tabletu dost neprijemne, ze nemohu vyuzivat ulozena data:-(
Translated Body: He was disappointed after installation. It does not sync your favorite items, or Sync. When trying to log in to Firefox it repeatedly says that the page can not be Nazist :-( Due to the use of synchronization between my other PCs and the phone, it is quite unpleasant for the tablet that I can not use the data saved :-(

Body:
If you like me and think that safari is garbage... iv tried every browser, and Firefox is the best working... on speed ,privacy , and interface.
Highly recommend it!

Subject: Keeps Crashing after Sept. 7/2017 update
Body: Keeps crashing every few minutes. Considering my internet sucks and every time it crashes I have to wait for the page to reload, wait several times while scrolling down to where I left off for the page to continue loading is very annoying. I just get to where I left off and it crashes again! It's getting to the point where I'll just switch to Safari which I hate till a fix comes.

Subject: The Ads drive me nuts
Body: I would gladly pay a fee for a pro version so that I wouldn't have to hit the little "X" every time an obnoxious ad pops up on my screen.  Apparently the pop-up blocker is useless.  Other than that, it works.

Author: Pablo Gonzalez Mereides
Subject: Verbesserungswürdig
Body:
*iOS 10.3.3 - iPhone 5s/ iPad Air 1*

Mit dem Update friert die App ständig ein. 
Eine Seite grade geladen, wird Sie mir plötzlich nur noch alles in grau angezeigt. Reload funktioniert nicht. 
Nur das komplette schließen und wieder öffnen geht. 
Bis sie wieder einfriert ...

++ ab 5.0 ++

Wenn man sich auf einer Seite einloggt und oder in die Tab Übersicht geht, funktioniert die zurück Funktion nicht mehr. Als hätte man einen neuen Tab geöffnet. Furchtbar 
++

Leider ist der Browser ein bisschen langsam und Java Seiten wie Amazon oder eBay wollen die Bilder nicht richtig anzeigen bzw die Bilder lassen sich nicht weiterwischen. 

Außerdem sind die Tabs umständlich gelöst. Im Übersicht Modus ruckelt es ordentlich. 

Umständlich ist auch die Anordnung der Einstellungen. Etwas, das man öfters nutzt, wie das Löschen der History/Cookies, sinkt immer weiter nach unten. 
Sowas gehört höher!

Völlig daneben finde ich die Lösung der Favoriten, denn beim Start des Browsers ist man im History Modus, nicht wie beim Safari im Lesezeichen/ Favoriten Modus. Auch der Favoriten Stern in der unteren Leiste muss weg. Da gehört der Tab Switcher hin, denn immer dafür nach oben zu manövrieren ist umständlich, weil sich die anderen Aktionen unten sind ...

Toll fände ich auch den Browser im privaten Modus starten zu lassen, leider muss man den jedesmal neu aktivieren. 

Generell freue ich mich aber auf den Firefox, wurde er von Mozilla doch anfangs aufgegeben für iOS. Es gibt leider auch noch sehr viel Luft nach oben. 

Ob Apple es Drittanbieter Browser auch erlaubt AddOns wie AdBlocks zu nutzen?
Translated Body: * iOS 10.3.3 - iPhone 5s / iPad Air 1 * The update constantly freezes the app. A page just loaded, you will suddenly only display everything in gray. Reload does not work. Only the complete close and re-open goes. Until it freezes again ... ++ from 5.0 ++ If you log in on a page and go to the tab overview, the back function no longer works. As if you opened a new tab. Terrible ++ Unfortunately, the browser is a bit slow and Java sites such as Amazon or eBay do not want the images to display properly or the images can not be wiped. In addition, the tabs are solved. In the overview mode jerky it properly. The arrangement of the settings is also inconvenient. Something that is often used, like deleting the history / cookies, sinks further and further down. That's higher! In addition, I find the solution of favorites, because at the start of the browser you are in the history mode, not like the Safari in the bookmark / favorites mode. Also the favorite star in the bottom bar must go away. There is the Switcher tab, because always maneuvering upwards is cumbersome because the other actions are down ... I would also like to launch the browser in private mode, unfortunately, you have to reactivate each time. In general, however, I am looking forward to Firefox, Mozilla was initially given up for iOS. There is unfortunately also a lot of air up. Whether Apple third-party browser also allows to use add-ons like AdBlocks?

Author: Racinguer
Subject: Guarda contraseñas a pesar de haber cerrado sesión
Body: Comparto el iPad y ya no quiero iniciar sesión con mi cuenta de Firefox como lo hago en la computadora con Windows porque en la versión para iPad se puede acceder a las contraseñas guardadas a pesar de que hayas cerrado sesión. Falla grave en la seguridad. Una lástima porque en Windows me manejo sin problemas y cuando cierro sesión o salgo de Firefox, al reiniciar la aplicación me pide la contraseña maestra que creé, cosa que la versión para iPad no tiene.
Translated Subject: Saves passwords despite having closed session
Translated Body: I share the iPad and I no longer want to log in with my Firefox account as I do on the Windows computer because in the iPad version you can access the saved passwords even though you have logged out. Serious safety failure. A pity because in Windows I manage without problems and when I log out or exit Firefox, restarting the application asks me for the master password I created, which the iPad version does not have.

Author: TFD44
Subject: BETTER THAN SAFARI❗️
Body:
I have used Firefox for years on PC's and never been disappointed. Adding it to my six iPads was a no brainer! The best browser out there, in my opinion. 
Microsoft has worked hard to make Internet Explorer totally irrelevant and THE browser to DELETE. Adding Firefox to iPads makes them even better!

Author: Irritated1960
Subject: Good brower marred by PATHETIC Bookmark management
Body:
Good fast browser able to display sites the Safari garbage can't, that is rendered almost useless by truly abysmal bookmark management. Mozilla, you seriously need to pull your socks up with this. No folder management, no re-ordering of bookmarks, to update a bookmark you have to delete it and add it back... The entire bookmark subsystem is embarrassingly archaic.  This browser would get a MUCH higher rating if the bookmark subsystem lived up to the rest of the package.

As of September 2017 this situation has no t changed.

Author: CAnna320
Subject: No Adblock and no download support
Body: It would be perfect if not for this. There are several browsers in the App Store that had native Adblock before content block apps so I'm not sure why a big gun like Firefox can't manage. It's so bad I've switched browsers until they introduce this. For downloading I'm not even asking for video support, just being able to download an ePub without having to switch to safari is enough. Again, why isn't this something that came with the original launch? Others can do it.

Subject: My favorite browser for security

Author: GreatSport
Subject: Version 9 is the Best Ever!
Body: Everything I could ask for in a mobile browser. Great work Firefox mobile team 👍

Subject: Firefox Web Browser
Body: The Firefox web browser is wonderful. It works fast and loads pages very quickly. I know Apple has strict rules about  what can be used but I was wondering if you could consider implementing the use of add ons in the future. But I'm glad Firefox focuses on Privacy. And in general I consider Firefox to be the best web browser.🦊

Author: McSear
Subject: Best update yet + solid browser
Body:
This is my go-to browser on my iPhone and iPad mini. I have tested 8 of them and kept the best 3 to use.  GR updates - Firefox has the best stability, features and default settings.  Mucho kudos to developers.  
#RECOMMENDED
...tested >3 weeks
...in use 9 months total

Body: 也是够了。火狐注定不是大众浏览器。

Subject: Needs more work
Body: As it stands, you cannot use paste for most sign ins, and password fillers are mostly useless with Firefox. I wish they would put as much effort into the mobile as they do the desktop.

Body: Спасибо за исправление работы синхронизации, всё идеально и теперь можно с меню десктопной версии браузера быстренько открыть мобильные закладки. Вы классные.
Translated Body: Thank you for correcting the work of synchronization, everything is perfect and now you can quickly open mobile bookmarks from the menu of the desktop version of the browser. You're great.

Subject: In need of improvement
Body:
Not a bad browser. Not great either.

Main gripe - I've no idea what the point is of the tab which declares 'Be on the lookout'? It's just an annoyance. I already have bookmarks, why do I want to be constantly reminded of my recent browsing history?? An option to turn this off would be great as I'm constantly having to clear my web history to get rid.

Translated Body: Not really Firefox but a graphical interface for Safari. It's not Mozilla's fault, Apple bans Browsers in the app store. Chrome is also just a skin.

Copy, paste or other functions while browsing have been disabled when selecting text. The only option now is "find in page" which crashes the app if you press it. Without copy and paste options browser is totally useless.

Body:
デスクトップで使っているので、同期機能が便利です（ブックマークの同期ができないという方がいますが、ちゃんとできています。本当の不具合なのか、デスクトップとモバイルでブックマークが分けられているのに気づいていないのかはわかりませんが……。あと、新規タブを開かなくても、アドレスバーをタップすればすぐにブックマークにアクセスできます）。バグ修正が足りていないのか、PDFを表示した時に、タブ上部が上に消えるに従ってPDFの表示がちらつきます（いちいちページを再読み込みしてしまうのだと思います）。これは改善を待ちたいと思います。

2017.9.21追記
バージョン9.0でようやくiOSで追加したブックマークをPC版で参照できるようになりました。長かった……。ブックマーク編集機能はまだないので、これの追加をまた待ちます……。
Translated Body: Because it is used on the desktop, the synchronization function is convenient (Although it is not possible to synchronize bookmarks, it is done, it is done properly.Whether it is a real defect, I have not noticed that bookmarks are separated by desktop and mobile I do not know if it is ... ... Also, without having to open a new tab, you can access the bookmark as soon as you tap the address bar.) Whether bug fixes are not enough, PDF display flickers as the top of the tab disappears when displaying the PDF (I guess it will reload the page one by one). I would like to wait for improvement. 2017.9.21 Postscript Version 9.0 now finally allows bookmarks added on iOS to be referenced in the PC version. It was long……. Since there is no bookmark editing function yet, I will wait again for this addition ... ....

Does not yet support drag and drop links in iOS 11 or Autofill with 1Password, reordering tabs, and some websites have trouble loading correctly.

I tried contacting support, but that is also too frustrating because you just get stuck in a loop!  And you can't get to support without logging in, which I can't do!!  I'll just stick with Safari thank you!

Author: Isaac Gray
Subject: Needs UI tweaking and Adblocking integration
Body:
Dear Mozilla,

This is a product with tons of opportunities. The custom search engine script is amazing, and finally allows me to use a custom search query for a trustworthy engine (StartPage). This finally pulls me away from the control of Google. However, some tweaks would make it a better product on iPad and iPhone:

1) Add Adblocking ability from Firefox Focus. I realize that it is no small feat as Apple does not allow Firefox iOS to use the apple scripts for Adblocking, but adopting the block lists to the fully fledged app would be a gift to all.

Update: 9/22/2017. Thank you for adding tracking protection, and at different levels! This is a huge improvement for user privacy and I commend Mozilla for continuing to fight the good fight against tracking.

2) Make bookmarks editable (renamable) and their order organizable. Currently you can only delete or open them in a new tab as options. It's not a mature feature set.

3) Move the new tab button on the tab viewing page from the bottom left to the bottom right. This keeps you from having to travel the diagonal from the tab button (upper right) to the opposite (bottom left) corner, switching hands. Useful on iPad, VERY USEFUL for iPhone use, which is often one handed.

4) the pin to top sites feature only allows one link to the domain of choice. If I want to have a link to my Amazon Orders, that will take over the general Amazon.com link. Make this more like the safari Favorites tab! There's no need to reinvent the wheel. Customization, privacy, and autonomy should be the hallmark of Firefox. Not some gimmicky, clunky suggested websites. What if I visit an illicit website and don't want to worry about it poppin up in a new tab?? I get it, use private browsing mode, but the suggested websites panel should be an option you can disable.

Lots of potential, but the app needs some streamlining and more options for the user. Apple locks us down, but Mozilla can potentially set us free.

Author: Manuelle Olson
Subject: Not Good
Body: And you destroyed Windows version too!

Add bookmarks and delete bookmarks is extremely easy to misuse, accidentally added, accidentally deleted! The most anti-human is the bookmark can not manage can not be renamed!

Subject: Very poor sync functionality
Body: Despite the most recent update that says they’ve improved their sync functionality with mobile to desktop sync, there is still a lot more work to be done before its usable. Sync is either terribly slow or doesn’t work. Syncing bookmarks between phone and computer are a must.

Author: 胡焦虑
Subject: 考研报名人的福音
Body: 你经历过18考研报名的绝望吗？连刷三天都刷不进去的绝望。火狐在手，报名我有。半小时，解决报名烦恼。这个五星，我给了！
Translated Body: Have you experienced the despair of 18 exams? Even brush three days do not brush into the despair. Firefox in hand, register me there. Half an hour to solve the registration trouble. This five-star, I gave it!

Author: Bud.G
Subject: Hebrew is NOT a supported language
Body: So much of computer and iPhone progress has originated in Israel.  Surely it should be one of your supported languages.

Author: Crash Pad
Subject: Good Safari alternative.
Body: I am becoming continually frustrated with Safari iOS. I find a number of websites aren't working correctly that work perfectly in other iOS browsers (Netflix is one example). Also when deleting website data, Safari has a well known bug where some cookies still remain.  Firefox, although not perfect, is a good alternative. The tracking protection feature is welcome (restricted to private browsing only in iOS 10) although blocking 3rd party cookies and a 'do not track' request should be added in a future release. Adding to the reading list was a bit of a faff to work out how to set it up but now works well enough. Firefox, sadly lacks the full iOS integration, thanks to Apple's restrictions and doesn't support Firefox plugins. Unlike Safari, Firefox doesn't have a website data list so we have to trust all cookies get deleted when clearing private data. Works where Safari doesn't. Good alternative but not perfect yet.

Author: maksim.maltcev
Subject: Background Youtube sound support not able
Body:
Так и не вернули поддержку звука из youtube, когда приложение свёрнуто и iPhone заблокирован. Аудиокниги, лекции на youtube в дороге так и не послушать. Совершенно не понятно, зачем это убрали. Ведь работало же раньше!
На десктопе пользуюсь только Firefox. Синхронизация была мне очень удобна. Но пришлось плюнуть на это и перейти на одного из конкурентов. Там со звуком с youtube в фоне всё в порядке. 
Жаль, что испортили приложение. Оставлю пока только в надежде на то, что исправите.
Translated Subject: Background Youtube sound support not able
Translated Body: And did not return support for the sound from youtube, when the application is collapsed and the iPhone is locked. Audiobooks, lectures on youtube on the road and never listen. It is completely unclear why this was removed. After all, it worked before! On the desktop I use only Firefox. Synchronization was very convenient for me. But I had to spit on it and go to one of the competitors. There's a sound with youtube in the background all right. It is a pity that spoiled the application. Leave so far only in the hope that you will correct.

Author: MikeLMA
Subject: Great. Want memory usage control.
Body:
I keep going back to Firefox on Desktop and iPhone. Love on Desktop. Preferred on iPhone. Great sync from desktop to iPhone. 

Issues:  
Cellular data usage:  HORRIBLE. Used more cellular data in 3 days than Safari and Google app together for rest of month doing the same things everyday!!!!  What?  Video ads!!!  Disabled all cellular usage for Firefox and use Safari and Google when using cellular data, which for me is months at a time. 

Memory Usage:  HORRIBLE. However, it has a method to clear "Documents and Data" usage, (unlike Google app), so no need to uninstall and reinstall to get back memory, BUT that memory clearing mechanism is hard to find. Need better control over memory usage. 

Bookmark control.  None. Delete only. No edit to change name or to group bookmarks in directories or even to group related bookmarks just together.

Author: BjNorsk
Subject: El mejor navegador en iOS
Body:
El mejor navegador en iOS. Espero que sigan manteniéndose en su política de software abierto, rápido y seguro con la versión 52 (que está en beta para desarrolladores). Por favor, que no te obligue a actualizar a iOS 11 en su próxima versión, así evitamos caer en la obsolescencia de dispositivos (hoy por hoy funcionales).

Best browser in iOS. I hope Mozilla continue open, fast and safe software in 52 version (available for developers) and it will be compatible on iOS 10.3. Please, do not force obsolescence of some functional devices. Open also means compatible to most of operative systems, isn't it?
Translated Body: The best browser on iOS. I hope you continue to keep your software policy open, fast and secure with version 52 (which is in beta for developers). Please, do not force you to upgrade to iOS 11 in your next version, so we avoid falling into the obsolescence of devices (nowadays functional). Best browser in iOS. I hope Mozilla will continue to open, fast and safe software in 52 version (available for developers) and it will be compatible on iOS 10.3. Please, do not force obsolescence of some functional devices. Open also means compatible to most of operative systems, is not it?

Author: MeleeCyrus
Subject: Good, but Tab Interface could use tinkering
Body: Good browser, but the way it handles tabs could use some work. New tabs open automatically without any type of visual feedback, so it’s a bit hard to tell right away if the page I’m viewing is on a different tab than the previous page I viewed. Also, I think it’d be better if the New Tab button was in an easier to reach spot. It’s a bit inconvenient having it on top, away from where I usually place my fingers near. Besides that, though, it’s a fine browser - especially if you use Firefox on your desktop or other devices.

Author: Scremped
Subject: Latest update is buggy
Body:
I have to say the latest update for IOS 11 has been a real mess for me. 

No longer can I press and hold on a thumbnail of a pic and get the option to open it in a new browser. Now it keeps trying to save the thumbnail. 

And speaking of saving. When I’m on a site like DeviantArt which is mostly jpgs just trying to scroll up and down results in the save/copy screen pop up over and over. Same goes for clicking on a pic to expand. It’s pretty maddening. 

Really hoping to see an update that gets things back to normal soon.

Body:

Normally Firefox for iOS is a stable browser, seems to do everything chrome does. I'm sticking with Firefox and I await an update. I trust Firefox more than Chrome.
